channel.description: Recent content in action on Game Rift

item.title: BALL x PIT
item.description: Game Description BALL x PIT is a dynamic roguelike, the events of which unfold in a world that has experienced the death of the great city of Ballbilon. After a mysterious cataclysm, a bottomless Pit was formed on the site of the metropolis, which attracted adventurers and treasure seekers from all over the world. The heroes will have to descend into its dark depths to fight hordes of enemies with the help of ricocheting balls and find the riches left over from the fallen civilization.

item.title: Escape from Duckov
item.description: Game Description Escape from Duckov is an action-adventure game that immerses you in a world where the main character, a little duck, has to survive and fight for his life. Having awakened from a strange dream, the protagonist finds himself in a harsh reality full of dangers and hostile creatures. To survive, he needs to explore the surrounding areas, constantly in search of useful supplies and resources. Every foray outside the shelter turns into a risky undertaking, because in the event of death, all the equipment found will be irretrievably lost.

item.title: Bad Janitor
item.description: Game Description Bad Janitor is a clever eviction operation disguised as routine cleaning of premises. The main character, acting undercover, must quietly create unbearable living conditions in order to force people to leave their apartments. Penetrating into other people’s apartments in the absence of the owners, the protagonist uses household items to organize minor dirty tricks. Every action, from turning on the radio at full volume to ruining the taps, must look like an accident, maintaining the cover of a secret agent.

item.title: Spindle
item.description: Game Description The uniqueness of Spindle is captivating. The concept of the project assumes the complete absence of death as such - no one dies, while the world around us is surrounded by chaos. Death itself is trying to find out the reason for what is happening. This time she won’t be alone; her faithful companion, the pig, is going with her on a journey through the old-school world. The main character arms herself with a scythe, takes a companion with her, and moves on to living beings.

item.title: Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga
item.description: Game Description Ys vs Trails in the Sky Alternative Saga is a dynamic crossover that unites characters from two famous universes, Ys and The Legend of Heroes. The legendary adventurer Adol Christin, his faithful companion Dogi and other heroes from the world of the franchise find themselves drawn into mysterious events that take them to the mysterious country of Xanadu. At the same time, Estelle Bright, Joshua Bright and their comrades from Liberl find themselves in the same world.

item.title: Beacon of Neyda
item.description: Game Description In Beacon of Neyda, a failed robot uprising has left the world in ruins. The last handful of humanity are trying to leave lifeless lands patrolled by hostile automata. Players will have to guide survivors through abandoned areas, building temporary fortifications to protect against mechanical threats. The main task is to organize an exodus from the dead wastelands. Each location offers a new challenge in the ongoing struggle for the future of the remaining people, forced to survive in a world under the rule of their former servants.

item.title: Bye Sweet Carole
item.description: Game Description In Bye Sweet Carole, Lana Benton begins to investigate the mysterious disappearance of her friend Carol Simmons. The tracks lead her to the gloomy Bunny Hall shelter, which holds many secrets. The action takes place in Britain at the beginning of the 20th century, during the birth of the women’s rights movement. The heroine will have to plunge into the abyss of the secrets of this institution in order to find answers and understand what fate befell Carol.

item.title: Rise Eterna 2
item.description: Game Description Rise Eterna 2 offers you to take control of Yacht, a soldier of the Atrakian Empire, whose goal is to return the former power to his state. The story continues the narrative of the original several years later, plunging the gamer into the epicenter of a conflict for the throne between two influential houses. The situation is complicated by a mysterious third faction, hatching a plan for final retribution and weaving its own intrigues.

item.title: Last Term
item.description: Game Description Last Term is a plunge into an endless nightmare, where a mysterious deity imprisoned the protagonist within the walls of a school. The main task is to escape from this time loop, for which you need to go down to the ground floor of the building. The way out of the vicious circle of repeating locations lies through attention to detail and the ability to distinguish the norm from the terrible deviations embedded in the familiar environment.

item.title: The Gretlow Tapes
item.description: Game Description The Gretlow Tapes explores the secrets of the abandoned Gretlow mansion, where the only tool for interacting with the world is a camera. Through the lens, you will not only document the frightening findings, but also interact with echoes of the past in order to uncover the dark secret of this place. The atmosphere of oppressive horror is created thanks to the realistic style of the found film and the ominous soundtrack.

item.title: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description The Legacy is a co-op survival horror game set in a dark tale of a family curse in a deserted town. Events unfold years after in 1990, Grandfather Molfar, a local sorcerer, refused to sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forces of the forest. To save his grandchildren, he sent them from their hometown of Svetlograd to Kyiv, but this act doomed the entire area to death and desolation.

item.title: Blood of Mehran
item.description: Game Description Blood of Mehran takes the legendary warrior Mehran to Ancient Mesopotamia, where his desire for a peaceful life is destroyed by the ambitions of others. Inspired by the Arabian Nights, the story revolves around themes of love, loss and loyalty. The game world includes sprawling palaces, bustling bazaars, and endless sand dunes to explore. Gamers can travel on horseback, exploring locations in search of secrets and collectibles hidden in cities and in the wild.

item.title: Vampire's Best Friend
item.description: Game Description Vampire’s Best Friend - a brave bat, controlled by the user, must make his way through deadly traps and treacherous obstacles to save his owner. The gameplay is based on unique flight mechanics, requiring refined and precise wing strokes to maneuver in confined spaces. The journey unfolds in gloomy but charming locations, among which there are foggy caves and ancient ruins. The visual design is stylized as retro classics, which is achieved through pixel graphics and a limited color palette, creating a nostalgic atmosphere.

item.title: Disaster Arms - Impact Project B.A.H.N.
item.description: Game Description Disaster Arms Impact Project B.A.H.N. - The story of a lonely soldier named Gveral, whose vengeful chase unfolds on the threshold of the global apocalypse. The world stands on the edge of death due to an alien invasion provoked by the ruthless experiments of the Kaisercorps corporation. The past of the gover, known as the “empty soldier”, is revealed through the non -linear narration, presented in the form of stylized comics, immersing in the gloomy atmosphere of the coming anti -utopia.

item.title: Melted Valor
item.description: Game Description Melted Valor is a desperate struggle for survival, unfolding in the vastness of an ordinary residential area that has turned into a field of all-out war. Under the command of the player are the Green Forces, whose peaceful days are in the past. Now they must defend their homes and friends from a ruthless threat known as the Tang Menace. The enemy does not hesitate to use the dirtiest methods to achieve his goals, turning the familiar world into a war zone.

item.title: Corporeal
item.description: Game Description Corporeal is a psychological thriller that immerses in the gloomy anti -utopian world in the role of Liam, a special operative known as a corporeal. This gift allows him to separate his mind from the physical body, turning into a ghostly essence to study the environment, collecting information and tactical planning. The main plot rotates around the investigation of a series of mysterious events that force the hero to encounter not only external threats in the form of demonic creatures, but also with his own internal demons.

item.title: Cladun X3
item.description: Game Description Cladun X3 - the newly arrived villain will have to take part in a fierce competition taking place on the mysterious island of Arcanus Cella. In this place, which has become a prison for all the villains of the world, a deadly game is unfolding, forcing former enemies of society to fight each other. The journey takes you through many dangerous dungeons, including randomly generated Ran-geons, where traps and enemies await around every corner.

item.title: HOTEL BARCELONA
item.description: Game Description HOTEL BARCELONA places the player inside a remote structure designed as a trap for American serial killers. The main character is Justine, a new federal marshal whose mind is shared with the maniac Dr. Carnival. Together, the two individuals must eliminate every criminal within the hotel’s walls. Their common goal is to survive this ordeal and get out of the building. The action in HOTEL BARCELONA takes place in a 2.

item.title: Macabre
item.description: Game Description Macabre plunges a squad of one to four into an unstable Rift with constantly changing maps and objectives. The key task is to find rare resources and stabilize the location before it is destroyed. The area is patrolled by a smart monster that adapts to the actions of gamers and forces them to constantly improvise. Survival depends on stealth and cunning, because outwitting this creature is the only chance, since open combat is impossible.

item.title: Agatha Christie - Death on the Nile
item.description: Game Description Agatha Christie - Death on the Nile takes gamers aboard the cruise liner, the journey through which is interrupted by a serious crime. At the scene, the detective Erkul Poiro, which begins the investigation. In parallel, the story introduces the private detective Jane Royce, whose pursuit of the killer leads her from London to Mallorca and Egypt. These two investigation lines are destined to cross in Abu Simbel, where the protagonists will have to combine efforts to disclose a confusing business.

item.title: Silent Hill F
item.description: Game Description Silent Hill F is a psychological project taking place in the 1960s in the Japanese city of Ebisugaok. The story tells about Simizu Hinako, who discovers that her native town is covered by a dense, anxious fog. As the fog spreads, the once calm town turns into a nightmare landscape filled with grotesque monsters and terrible puzzles. Simizu should navigate in this surrealistic environment, faced with difficulties that check her physical and mental capabilities.

item.title: Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III
item.description: Game Description In Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part 3, a conspiracy related to the strange moon above Gansko is revealed. During the annual festival of mid -autumn, the lunar exhibition is unusually lively. With the sunrise of the full moon, a huge curtain stops the movement of the night sky to the ground. This phenomenon lures numerous Yokaev - creatures, previously known only by rumors interested in a passing banquet.

item.title: Baby Steps
item.description: Game Description Baby Steps puts players in the role of Nate, an unemployed man with no stated purpose. He discovers a previously unknown ability: the ability to consciously put one foot in front of the other. The gameplay is entirely focused on a physical walking simulation, where each step Nate takes is a separate action, controlled from a third person. Controlling the character in the world of Baby Steps, constantly shrouded in fog, step by step, becomes the main task.

item.title: Crypt Crawler
item.description: Game Description The plot of Crypt Crawler starts after the fall of the heroes of the kingdom under the onslaught of the hordes of undead, poured from the open gates of the underworld. The mission to seal the fault is assigned to a lonely mechanic goblin. The character will have a 16-level descent into the dungeon in a dungeon in a monsters to achieve and close the portal. Each stage offers a new tactical task, forcing the goblin to climb deeper into the enemy territory for the sake of fulfilling the mission.

item.title: Granvir
item.description: Game Description The Granvir pilots are fading to the partisan war, controlling heavily armed furs. The key task is to promote the battlefield to the evacuation points with parallel collection of components. Details fall from defeated opponents, allowing to constantly replace and improve the combat vehicle. The arsenal includes both near -battle weapons like swords and pile installations, as well as long -range cannons with flamethrowers. Such a system pushes gamers to experiments with various equipment combinations to complete the tasks.

item.title: Hyperviolent
item.description: Game Description HYPERVIOLENT is the most dynamic action game in which the player will immerse himself in the atmosphere of action games of the 90s. Pixel animation, frantic battles that turn into a bloody mess and a huge variety of weapons will definitely not let you get bored. No matter how difficult the victory may be, the main thing is to achieve the goal and destroy all opponents on the field.

item.title: It has my face
item.description: Game Description IT HAS My Face unfolds the action in a crowded area, where a double, indistinguishable from others, tracks out a protagonist. The player’s main task is to identify this hostile clone in the crowd and eliminate it before the death attack. This key mechanics gives rise to a procedurally generated paranoia, forcing to constantly maintain vigilance and notice barely noticeable details in behavior. Survival depends on the timely discovery of the only hidden threat, otherwise the character will be a victim of a sudden attack, and the cycle will begin again.

item.title: Bloodthief
item.description: Game Description Bloodthief sends a vampire to a high -speed race through dangerous dungeons and ghost locks. By controlling the character in the first person, the player uses inertia to perform parkour-malevors in a complex three-dimensional environment. Moving is combined with a near battle on swords, and victory over enemies that block the path requires accurate strikes. The main task is to explore the locations for the disclosure of dark secrets hidden in them, surviving under the onslaught of constant threats.

item.title: Deadly Days: Roadtrip
item.description: Game Description Deadly Days: Roadtrip sends gamers on a journey from one stop to another in the world in a teeming zombie. Moving by bus along the procedurally generated route, survivors make decisions that determine their further path. The main gameplay cycle consists of battles with crowds of the dead in different locations to collect supplies and fuel. This constant struggle allows you to continue the trip and brings closer to salvation from a ruthless chase.

item.title: Den Pain
item.description: Game Description Den Pain introduces Dan - a cleaner whose life has come down. Dismissed with a meager allowance, he remains alone in an abandoned apartment near New York. Its isolation is aggravated by a father, instead of help, bringing only bitter reproaches. The betrayal of a woman named Louise ends with a robbery, humiliation and a gun attached to his temple. He is a choice: take your fate or take up a weapon in order to return everything lost.

item.title: A Gentlemen's Dispute
item.description: Game Description In A Gentlemen’s Dispute, up to 8 fighters fight in multiplaying competitions for the title of the last survivor. They use various weapons, including bits, bazuki, guns and placed traps to eliminate opponents. The action takes place on closed arenas for a simple purpose - to eliminate all other opponents. Each match is a dynamic battle with a third -person view, focusing on a direct collision and tactical placement for victory.

item.title: Folly of the Wizards
item.description: Game Description Folly of the Wizards proposes to try on the role of a sorcerer’s student from a kind of magical cult. The main task is to stop the invasion of demons, passing through a series of procedurally created dungeons. Each race will require the use of unpredictable spells to destroy bizarre opponents and advance inland of chaotic locations. To survive, a quick reaction and a tactical mindset are necessary to overcome many dangers.

item.title: Megabonk
item.description: Game Description In Megabonk, the gamer opposes the endless waves of creatures on randomly generated maps. The main task is to withstand the onslaught for as long as possible, using the mechanics of the slasher and a third -person shooter. With the strengthening of the Horde, survival depends on the destruction of opponents and maneuvering in space. The purpose of each stage is to find and defeat the location boss, opening access to a new, more difficult zone.

item.title: Moros Protocol
item.description: Game Description Shootouts in Moros Protocol take place in a sci-fi setting where users have to face a variety of mutated monsters. The game is stylized as old-school designs drawn in pixel graphics. The gameplay is an action first-person shooter with roguelike elements. The main character is forced to confront the monsters and bandits that appeared in the universe due to the activities of two megacorporations involved in neurobiology. In the Darkverse universe, users have the opportunity to explore dark laboratory dungeons that will be formed randomly.

item.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
item.description: Game Description Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter follows Estelle Bright and her half-brother Joshua as they begin their journey in the peacekeeping guild. Their initial task is to earn recognition by completing various tasks. A seemingly simple task in the Kingdom of Liberl gradually reveals a difficult political situation. The pair soon discover that their personal ambitions are intertwined with the stability of the state, forcing the heroes to face challenges beyond their training.

item.title: Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum
item.description: Game Description Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum stands out against the background of similar projects due to specific visual design and design. Here, as the protagonist, is a cybernetic corporate agent who has to go through a series of tests in order to get to the bottom of the truth. Each step here needs to be carefully weighed, because only one enemy bullet can finish the journey of the hero. But everything is not so bad, because he has his trump cards in his sleeve, and it is at the expense of them that he will be able to get an advantage over opponents.

item.title: Dying Light: The Beast
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Beast invites gamers to return to the chaotic world of Harran, but this time the story unfolds in the rural area of ​​the Castorsky forest. This new environment is a different kind. If Harran was an overgrown urban venue with high buildings and destroying infrastructure, then Castor Woods is more calm, with small towns and extensive natural spaces. This is the same dangerous world, but now with a more extensive space, in the open air, which offers new ways to combat the usual dangers.

item.title: Hellbrella
item.description: Game Description Hellbrella sends a cat in a cloak in the depths of the underworld. The main task is to survive in battles with hordes of demonic eyes and other monsters. The combat system is based on dynamic air mechanics in the Hack and Slash genre, focusing on continuous movement and pure aggression. The hero uses an umbrella as a single weapon, conducting long combinations in flight to clean up locations.

item.title: Hollowdeep
item.description: Game Description In Hollowdeep, a trip to the world of dark fantasy with a first -person view begins. The gameplay is focused on the study of medieval dungeons inhabited by demons and undead. Battles require a quick reaction from the gamer and the exact calculation of time. The key element of the battles is the mechanics of the parry, which serves as the main protective and attacking tool. Survival often depends on the masterful possession of this technique in the fight against numerous threats that live in an ominous environment.

item.title: Mai: Child of Ages
item.description: Game Description MAI: Child of Ages tells about the adventures of the main character in the split world looking for himself after the last Great War. Together with her grandfather, she wanders through the era, studying the connection between antiquity and the gloomy future. The purpose of the trip is to learn about the events that entailed the disappearance of mankind, and to find out the origin of mysterious creatures that threaten the Universe.

item.title: Netherworld
item.description: Game Description Netherworld introduces a player with a jellyfish named Medu, who went to the bar to fill in grief with vodka after his wife leaves. This family crisis is the beginning of an unexpected trip to gloomy lands inhabited by strange creatures. Trying to establish his life, honey is in contact with the local population consisting of cocaine magicians, enterprising prostitutes, gangsters and sociopathic children. The plot moves through dialogs and investigations related to these characters.

item.title: PIGFACE
item.description: Game Description The main character of PIGFACE, a woman named Exit, comes to her senses and discovers a bomb implanted in her head. Her past actions led to her being blackmailed into fulfilling contracts for the figures now controlling her life. Missions do not have a prescribed method of completion, allowing both rapid assaults and more tactical, slow progress. The only requirement is to complete the goal by any available means.

item.title: Platypus Reclayed
item.description: Game Description Platypus Reclayed takes place as an overpopulated Collosatropolis sets its sights on neighboring Mungola for expansion. The smog-choked metropolis sends out its formidable battle fleet to seize new lands. The people of Mungola are forced to rely on the only force that can protect them. A squadron of outdated F-27 fighters becomes the last hope against the full might of the invaders, laying the groundwork for a desperate defensive campaign.

item.title: Puzzle Quest: Immortal Edition
item.description: Game Description Puzzle Quest: Immortal Edition features a combat system that resolves conflicts on a match-three grid. Gamers collect combinations of 3 or more gems of the same color, accumulating mana for their hero. This resource powers the character’s arsenal of spells and abilities, used to defeat various opponents. Successful encounters bring rewards, new items, and open the way to completing main and side quests in the lands of Etheria.

item.title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree
item.description: Game Description Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree begins with how the priestess of the goods collects its associates to protect the village of Shinju from the advancing evil. She has to lead the guards against the forces of the Magatz - the essence that threatens the distant mystical world. The main task is to restore peace, exploring dangerous lands, whose splendor hides numerous threats. The adventure covers several temporary lines, during which the detachment is fighting for the future of his house.

item.title: Lord Ambermase
item.description: Game Description The Universe in Lord Ambermaze succumbed to a terrible curse that stopped the normal course of time. The main character is a guy named Zin, who owns an ancient magic relic under the name “sword of movement.” Thanks to the enchanted weapon, the protagonist gets the opportunity to move freely around the world and resist the dangers that the Lord Ambermase prepares. Users will have to save the kingdom and the princess, which is in the imprisonment of the criminal.

item.title: Lost skies
item.description: Game Description Lost Skies offers a world consisting of fragmented land arrays, where gamers move through heaven filled with ancient ruins and advanced technologies. They lay courses through this environment, creating their own aircraft in order to withstand the environment forces and serious threats among the soaring islands. This cooperative game supports both group expeditions with friends and single travels through its space. Gamers travel to Lost Skies to explore the ruins of past civilizations, trying to understand the causes of their death.

item.title: Superhero Simulator
item.description: Game Description The Superhero Simulator has to protect Goldpine - a city faced with an increase in crime. The player’s main task is to patrol streets, suppress robberies, save civilians and enter into an open battle with villains. Each successful act reveals new abilities, gradually increasing the power of the character. This gameplay cycle is combined with the need to lead an ordinary life, forcing to constantly look for a balance between two different roles.

item.title: Voyages of Nera
item.description: Game Description Voyages of Nera offers gamers the role of Echo, a descendant of the long -disappeared defenders of the world. The main task is to cross the magical ocean to confront monstrous creatures and the awakening of scattered spirits. This world, negligently, is filled with ancient ruins and original biomes located on its islands. Players can combine up to 10 people for joint swimming around the seas or go on a trip alone.

item.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
item.description: Game Description eXoSpace Combat Engineer is a journey into the depths of a procedurally generated galaxy, where survival depends solely on engineering savvy and piloting skill. In the role of a bounty hunter, you will have to chart a course through unexplored sectors of space, each hyperjump in which promises unpredictable events. Fate can lead you to a research station in distress, throw you into the thick of a battle with pirates, or force you to face a moral choice - to provide assistance or engage in robbery.

item.title: Greedland
item.description: Game Description Greedland is an exciting isometric shooter in which you play for the interstellar mercenary. Fight in constantly changing environmental environments and destroy the waves of enemies. If you like a dynamic gameplay like Crimsonland and Vampire Survivors, then Greedland is an ideal game for you! An online mode is offered for 2-4 people, an endless regime, a number of complex tasks, a system of fur and many roles to choose from.

item.title: Beyond Sunset
item.description: Game Description Beond Sunset is a bright neon action, in which the player will become a street samurai. The beautiful style of the city of the future, where there is a crime scene and unique cybernetic developments are recreated in a pixel style with smooth animations. The game is perfect for those who love a deep story that opens through the dialogs with NPS, as well as powerful battles with thought out tactics.

item.title: Bratz Rhythm and Style
item.description: Game Description Bratz Rhythm and Style offers players to go on a world tour with Claus, Yasmin, Sasha and Jade. The main task is to earn a reputation on the catwalks around the world. The studio has to create unique images for the chosen heroine using tools for designing outfits, hairstyles and makeup. These branded styles are demonstrated in competitions and performances. The main trip consists of traveling around the iconic cities to participate in local events and the formation of unique identity for the team.

item.title: Retromania Wrestling
item.description: Game Description Retromania Wrestling is a sequel to the cult game Wrestlefest, which was released back in 1991. The gameplay is a dynamic wrestling that is distinguished by detailed two -dimensional sprites of characters and animated backgrounds. In fact, before you a simplified version of the struggle without rules, balancing on the verge of a simulator and arcade. Roster of wrestlers is 16 unique athletes, each of whom owns an individual battle style and is distinguished by appearance.

item.title: Shape of Dreams
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dreams project, whose essence is this: Imagine the action of Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC Gamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Wandness: Wandcraft Survivor
item.description: Game Description Wandness: Wandcraft Survivor will put in the center of the process the creation of magic guns for survival in collisions with superior forces. The player’s main task is to go down as a procedurally generated dungeons for battles with hordes of monsters. The main tool for survival is a unique rod collected from the found magical components. This craft mechanics allows you to construct unique spells that change the behavior of shells used in battle.

item.title: Katanaut
item.description: Game Description Katanaut sends a player aboard a giant space station, the inhabitants of which turned into monsters. The character will have to move around the dangerous halls of the structure in search of a source of cosmic chaos, which absorbed the whole complex. Promotion deep into the object opens up constantly changing and increasingly distorted locations. Battles with former people are based on the system of close attacks with a blade and protective evasions that help to survive clashes with the hordes of opponents.

item.title: Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection
item.description: Game Description Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is a comprehensive publication that includes four key projects dedicated to the adventures of the protagonist-rosy. The gamer has to control the anthropomorphic hero, jumping on the platforms and collecting balls of yarn. The collection contains Bubsy in: Claws Encounters of the Furred Kind, Bubsy II and Bubsy in: Fractured Furry Tales. The compilation clearly demonstrates the evolution of the series from the classic two-dimensional sidcroling to early experiments in three-dimensional space with the inclusion of the Bubsy 3D sign.

item.title: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite
item.description: Game Description Firefighting Simulator: Ignite sends a brigade to a large metropolis to combat dynamic fires. Tasks are carried out in conjunction with three other players in a network cooperative or in a single -user mode with the support of partners under the control of AI. Events unfold in a big city in the American Middle West. Each incident is based on physical simulation that simulates the spread of flame in real time, accumulation of smoke and heat transfer through the structure.

item.title: Mage and Monsters 2
item.description: Game Description Mage and Monsters 2 opens the battlefield on which the hired hero leads the army to an automatic battle. During these battles, the player actively supports his forces, using spells with a view of the top. Further development is determined by the strategic elections accepted between the battles and focused on the strengthening of the hero’s personal power, strengthen the troops or increase the potential of magic. The decisions made directly affect the effectiveness of autonomously acting units and determine the course of fantasy war.

item.title: Star Fire: Eternal Cycle
item.description: Game Description Star Fire: Eternal Cycle triggers a race in which the main character makes jerks and combo against alien enemies in futuristic 2.5D-gallocations. The gameplay is built on a combination of sid-scrolling battles in the spirit of Beat ‘Em Up and progression systems characteristic of Roguelite. Each attempt to clean the level is distinguished by a unique arrangement of enemies and procedurally generated branches of tracks. The player’s movement and attacks are designed for direct control, requiring evasions and accurate calculation of the time to win the cyberpanic opponents in the destroyed environment.

item.title: Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story
item.description: Game Description Bazar Simulator: The Wan Story will throw players in the role of Wang, who arrived in Bokeron City to control the bazaar of his uncle. While his uncle, Van Lun, is passionate about slot machines, Van’s father, Yussef, acts as a mentor in business. However, the outlet itself stores secrets leading to cooperation with the local mafia and a hidden conspiracy. This situation forces the protagonist to combine daily commerce with investigations regarding his own family, combining the management of the shop full of intrigues.

item.title: Cronos: The New Dawn
item.description: Game Description Cronos: The New Dawn represents to gamers a unique mixture of time travel, horror to survival and tactical battle. The action takes place in a gloomy post -apocalyptic world and immerses players in a dark and unpredictable narrative. History begins with a mysterious assignment from the team, a mysterious organization that sends you to Poland in the 1980s. As a traveler, you are instructed to find people who died during the Apocalypse, and return their souls to the future.

item.title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion
item.description: Game Description Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion offers to pilot a fully customized fur arsenal around the open world of an alien planet, participating in battles on Earth and in the air. Gamers examine a variety of locations, including plains and mountains, moving on foot in armor, in flight or riding a horse. The gameplay is built on the confrontation with mechanical and organic enemies in order to extract their weapons and equipment.

item.title: Adventure of Samsara
item.description: Game Description Adventure of Samsara begins with the resurrection of a solar champion, a long -dead Plutonian, revived by a primitive light source. This creature is instructed to re -activate the inter -spatial fortress to restore balance in the entire multi -senior. The main narrative explores the topics of death, revival and fragmented memory, while the protagonist moves through the deeply connected world. The disclosure of the deeper layers of the space storyline is a key component of advancement, requiring players to overcome the obstacles of the environment to fulfill their goal.

item.title: Hell is us
item.description: Game Description Hell is US is an adventure game that immerses gamers into a half -open world characterized by chaos and uncertainty. The action takes place in a country torn by the civil war, and offers users to move through conflict zones and unravel the confusing web of the reasons behind the riots. Gamers take on the role of a protagonist, armed with near -fight weapons, and are ready to face a number of problems and opponents, traveling through this dangerous landscape.

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
item.description: Game Description Hollow Knight: Silksong talks about the deadly princess Hornet, who protects Hallowest. The girl will travel through the new kingdom of music and silk, faced with unpredictable enemies who block her path to ancient secrets. More than 150 bosses and opponents are available in the game, among which there are not only killers and kings, but also animals and even insects. The main character will have to defeat all the obstacles and reveal the secrets of her nature and the past.

item.title: Jetrunner
item.description: Game Description Jetrunner combines first -person parkour with dynamic shooting in the framework of futuristic sports. Opponents move along the arenas created by hand, using a combination of running, jumping, sliding and firing for promotion. The fully voiced story campaign is dedicated to the history of the newcomer-sensation of Nina White, rising along the competitive ladder. Her path describes battles and challenges in an attempt to achieve legendary status in this discipline.

item.title: Burger Bots Inc.
item.description: Game Description Burger Bots Inc is an intense fight for survival, where the only means of defense for the entire team is a single shotgun. Horrors lurk in the basement of the establishment, and the staff provides the resources to prepare cutlets to combat them. The survival of the team directly depends on coordinated actions and the ability to withstand random, nightmarish events that bring chaos to the work process. Each shift turns into a test, because the main task is not only to serve visitors, but also to stay alive, repelling attacks from hostile entities.

item.title: Hirogami
item.description: Game Description Hirogami will allow you to take under the control of HIRO - a protagonist armed with a paper fan to combat digital invaders. This character from the village of Sisiki goes on a trip to save the world created from folded paper. The central conflict is tied with a force called bad and corrupting local inhabitants. For navigation through the environment and overcoming the barriers, the hero uses the ability to turn into various animals.

item.title: Temple of the Green Moon
item.description: Game Description Temple of the Green Moon sends a skeptical blogger to the Zhigulevsky mountains to expose local myths about abnormal zones. Its goal is to ridicule and refute all rumors for his audience, guided by a firm disbelief in the supernatural. Soon he is faced with an unthinkable reality for himself, where mysterious forces change his perception. This journey makes the hero doubt his worldview when meeting with ancient rituals, rare collections and mythological secrets that are not amenable to simple explanation.

item.title: Bad Cheese
item.description: Game Description Bad Cheese provides gameplay where a little mouse performs a series of household chores while spending the weekend with his dysfunctional father in the absence of his mother. The key task is to remain in the favor of the parent and avoid punishment in the house shared with the brother and other demonic beings. The mouse has to wash the floors, cook French fries, destroy spiders and bring medicine to his father.

item.title: Dungeon Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Warfare 3 offers the player to construct a deadly obstacle strip, laying out the landscape tiles and cutting out dangerous paths for the advancing adventurers. The main activity is the deployment of an expanded arsenal of traps and cunning mechanisms intended for inflicting injuries, wounds and disorientation of enemy detachments. You can directly form a battlefield, erecting walls or swarms and thereby directing opponents to strategically arranged protective structures.

item.title: Lost Soul Aside
item.description: Game Description Lost Soul Aside is a role -playing action inspired by Ninja Gaiden and Final Fantasy XV. The game has a worked out combat mechanics and provides an opportunity to explore a huge open world inhabited by various phantasmagoric creatures. The visual style is inspired by the “final box” and all lovers of modern JRPG-games will appeal. The game is based on a complex combat system, a characteristic series about deadly ninjo.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Solid δ: Snake Eater is a remake of a classic stealth explosion, telling the story of the origin of the legendary soldier Big Boss. The action unfolds in 1964, during the Cold War, and the main character Naked Snape penetrates the Soviet Union to stop the nuclear threat and resist his former mentor Boss, who went over to the side of the enemy. There is a rich storyline with memorable characters, such as Ozelot, Eve and The End, which throw various challenges.

item.title: The Knightling
item.description: Game Description In The Knightling begins a campaign for a missing mentor, Sir Lyionstone, who did not return from his last wanderings. Being a protege of a warrior, the protagonist goes to the lands of the Classia in search of him. The main tool on this journey is the legendary shield left by Liionstone. The protagonist confronts the bandits and monsters, exploring the power of this artifact and the glorious past of the kingdom in order to find a mentor before the regional destabilization of the region.

item.title: Chip N Clawz vs. The Brainioids
item.description: Game Description In Chip N Clawz vs. The Brainioids will have to collect a resource called Brainum, build bases and manage the army of bots against alien invaders. The gamer takes under the direct control of the inventor of the chip or robocot Clause with a third -person view, leading the assault in order to return the abducted crystals. The main conflict is tied to the Braynioids who took resources into their engraving spheres.

item.title: GEARS of WAR: Reloaded
item.description: Game Description GEARS of WAR: Reloaded provides access to the original Title, which passed the procedure for a comprehensive reprint, preserving the essence of the original. This version is distinguished by the introduction of technical improvements, among which it appears to support the image output in resolution 4K and the possibility of reaching the screen update up to 120 frames per second, which ensures the smoothness of the visual series.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Turretgirls
item.description: Game Description Turretgirls offers to manage an operative with a turret reflecting the attacks of extraterrestrial forces from unstable wormholes. The main mission is to protect the generator, the only source of energy for planetary superweapies. Acting with a fixed rail platform, the heroine is opposed to the swarm of alien invaders that threaten the entire installation. The survival of the planet depends on this single defense against the invasion horde, since the retreat is impossible.

item.title: Wolf Mate
item.description: Game Description In Wolf Mate, a new student will have to explore the locked school in time, solving puzzles to escape from the heroine pursuing him named Freya. The narrative starts on the first day of the protagonist, introducing him to Freya - a classmate with an unusual aura. Because of the meeting with the teacher, the young man lingers until the evening and discovers the locked gates. In the walls of the darkened building, Freja occurs again, but her behavior acquires strange and threatening features, which becomes a tie for night incidents.

item.title: Hordelord
item.description: Game Description Hordelord throws a player on the closed arenas against the consistent waves of hostile creatures. Gamers use destructive weapons and high mobility to move the location and reprisals against opponents. The task is to score the maximum number of points for getting into the world tables of leaders, relying on accurate shooting and a system for fixing murders. The gameplay is distinguished by constant violence, concentrating on the suppression of opponents with speed and fire power.

item.title: Project X: Light Years
item.description: Game Description In the Project X: Light Years, the user will have to pilot a modern starship through enemy territories 30 years after the initial battle. There is navigation on various locations, including asteroid fields and outposts in deep space, where it will have to be opposed by the waves of alien opponents. The main task is to collect objects that improve the firepower, speed and protection of the ship.

item.title: The Dark Queen of Mortholme
item.description: Game Description The Dark Queen of Mortholme starts from the victory of the Land overlord over the invading hero. The conflict, it would seem, is exhausted, but the applicant is inexplicably returning, meeting the right death over and over again. This violence cycle takes place in a two -dimensional world with a fixed screen, where the player uses the queen’s arsenal to multiply pacify the insolent. The plot reveals the secret of the stubbornness of the antagonist, offering a short adventure combining action with a rich history.

item.title: A FISTFUL of YANKEES
item.description: Game Description A FISTFUL of Yankes offers the player to lead a detachment of government soldiers sent to the American West in 1865 to combat desperate criminals and robber barons. On this post -war frontier, life and death solve weapons. The key task of the unit is to establish order by tracking the robbers attacking the settlers. However, this mission draws the fighters into a much larger conflict with serious consequences, going beyond initial orders.

item.title: OVIS LOOP
item.description: Game Description Ovis Loop throws a cybernetic sheep, which was a guardian robot, into the post-apocalyptic world for the confrontation of wolves to the legions using a science fiction sword. After the massacre, arranged by the robot, AI with amnesia wakes up in a new guise. The player has to follow the brutal struggle of this mechanical creature for survival against predators. He needs to take on the burden of the hidden truths of the world, challenging a familiar story that can be not at all as it is commonly believed.

item.title: Metavoidal
item.description: Game Description Metavoidal puts the player in the role of the drummer after an unsuccessful listening in the metal group. The musician discovers that the work of the team controls reality, turning the world into a hostile environment. The army of defiled fans is now standing on the way to freedom, imposing the will of its idols. To destroy this curse, the drummer will repulse each participant in the ominous team, using only a couple of drum sticks.

item.title: Echoes of the end
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the end puts the player under the control of Rin, the west that owns magic. The central plot tells about her campaign to save her brother from the totalitarian empire, which can prevent the war. It is united with Abram Finley, scientists, and together they are trying to reveal a conspiracy that can light up an ancient conflict. The narrative affects the topics of trust, atonement and self -sacrifice against the backdrop of the Time of Troubles in the world of AEM.

item.title: Fallen City Brawl
item.description: Game Description Fallen City Brawl was inspired by classic games in the spirit of “Being of all of them” and was created in a pleasant retro style. The player will have to go out onto the streets, teeming with criminals and eliminating everyone who will stand in the way of his team. Only by uniting, experienced fighters will be able to survive, destroy the source of evil and, finally, feel free.

item.title: Shields of Loyalty
item.description: Game Description Shields of Loyalty - Turn-based strategy in which you need to take command of an army consisting of several units and classes. Set out to explore a mysterious island, moving across the battlefield using hexagonal hexes. Develop a strategy and increase the efficiency of your army. Fight powerful warriors who are followers of darkness. Shields of Loyalty takes place in the dark fantasy world of Mantaria. There are several small armies under your command.

item.title: The Scouring
item.description: Game Description The Scouring is a real-time strategy game about the conflict between the human and orc factions. Players can choose a mode that includes building fortifications, collecting materials, and commanding military units. This gameplay requires strategic leadership of forces using both magic and guns to wage war. All factions must also defend their positions from waves of attacking undead that appear at night, which adds a survival element to base management.

item.title: World War Z vr
item.description: Game Description World War Z VR is a single -user first -person shooter that places people in the world captured by the undead. It has to withstand the enormous clusters of zombies in cruel combat clashes. This action adapts the basis of its predecessor, a title with a base of players exceeding 25 million people. Survival depends on the movement along the territories infected by the dead and the use of firearms to eliminate the hordes of advancing opponents.

item.title: Cleanfall
item.description: Game Description Cleanfall puts a player at the head of the harvesting robot, the only function of which is to maintain cleanliness in the house. This simple task becomes a planetary mission after one techie brought the world closer to his sun. The cataclysm that happened covered the surface with a whirlwind of dust and death, making a restraint of order impossible. In order to bring cleanliness in his house again, the mechanism must first correct the whole world, going down to the underground layers of the planet to start his work.

item.title: Era One
item.description: Game Description Era One puts the player into the future with the destroyed political system of mankind. After a catastrophic gravitational event that paralyzed mass migration, societies on board the giant space cities enter the war for stinging resources. The mutated bioshahters pose a constant threat to the entire solar system. In these conditions, a woman named Alya de Chars is trying to get a source of energy for a secret ship, striving for a new beginning.

item.title: GemPorium: A Cute Mining Sim
item.description: Game Description GemPorium: A Cute Mining Sim will put a player at the head of the family business after a relative goes on vacation. The inheritance obtained includes not only a shop with gems, but also an impressive duty that requires immediate repayment. The main task is to generate income from the activities of the store and the simultaneous peacefulness of the user to prevent bankruptcy. The gameplay was built around a limited daily time cycle, forcing to make decisions on resource and time management in conditions of constant pressure from the very start.

item.title: GuntouChables
item.description: Game Description GuntouChables sets from 1 to 4 players in the role of prepared survivors in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The main task is to conquer ground territories at hordes of hostile, continuously evolving mutants. These creatures constantly invent new methods of eliminating heroes, bringing fresh threats with every battle. The gameplay is tied to the confrontation of this dynamically changing enemy force. Promotion in the plot is tied to the execution of missions for which Upcrates are issued with currency and perks to increase the chances of survival.

item.title: King's Blade
item.description: Game Description King’s Blade throws a small detachment of elite warriors to break through the hordes of the Bargian Empire. This Beat ‘Em Up with side scrolling immerses in a gloomy fantasy world created under the influence of the Konan-Cover and Arcadian Titles universe like Golden Axe and Streets of Rage. Players have to move around the enemy lands and participate in brawls, trying to break through to the capital of the enemy.

item.title: The House of the Dead 2: Remake
item.description: Game Description The House of the Dead 2: Remake is a rail shooter where gamers in the role of secret agents of James or Gary cleans the city. This game offers a single passage or local cooperative regime for the destruction of hordes of hostile creatures that block the path. The first -person gameplay immerses the operatives in cruel clashes with the hostile inhabitants of the metropolis. The main goal is to survive and find out the source of the flash, moving through the captured streets and buildings.

item.title: Static Dread: The Lighthouse
item.description: Game Description Static Dread: The Lighthouse begins after the global cataclysm, placing the player on the island far from the coast. The port authorities re -activate the lighthouse again, sending the only caretaker to control him. He uses radio equipment to send ships to the harbor - a task that has consequences for the city and vessels at sea. On the mainland, a wife and daughter are waiting for him, a fact that affects his work and spiritual state.

item.title: Grand Empire 2: Portals Apart
item.description: Game Description Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart is a survival and crafting experience built around traversing magical portals. As a sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel, this project develops the concept of a directed adventure. The journey takes the player through a series of fantasy worlds, where each portal opens up access to new resources. Development follows a linear technology path, forming a structured single-player campaign instead of an open-world sandbox where the gamer determines his own goals.

item.title: Kitchen Wars
item.description: Game Description Kitchen Wars collects from 2 to 8 people for restaurant rivalry, dividing gamers into warring teams. Groups from 1 to 4 people on each side work in their appointed institution. The main task is to find a balance between visitors' maintenance and interference for a competing business. Groups control their institution, simultaneously preventing opponents from direct actions. In Kitchen Wars, the teams are focused on the preparation and delivery of orders so that customers are satisfied.

item.title: Liftoff: Micro Drones
item.description: Game Description Liftoff: Micro Drones is a drone simulator. The game is dedicated to FPV thrones and FPV quadrocopters. This is the name of the model equipped with a camera, allowing their owners to observe the flight with first -person view. For those who prefer to watch actions from the outside, there is an opportunity to change the camera angle. This video game contains 6 really existing UAVs from well -known manufacturers, some of which are allowed to modify.

item.title: Shikiyoku -teru yumemi in the nightmare-
item.description: Game Description In Shikiyoku -teru Yumemi in the Nightmare- Paranormal detective Teru Yumami uses the ability of Dream Link to penetrate the worlds created by ghosts after death. His sister Luna helps him return to reality with the help of his strength, a curse of the red thread. Together they investigate paranormal incidents and help people who have learned too much, performing a mission inherited from the late mother. The plot develops in the format of the detective series, and the entire gameplay with the study of locations and mini-stories is designed for 10 hours.

item.title: Tall Trails
item.description: Game Description Tall Trails gives control of the Alps, a little goal in search of its purpose. The movement is tied on a rocket boot - a device that consumes collected items as a fuel for flights. The gamer has to run and climb the world using a boot for a vertical rise. Each item gives a unique effect, changing the method of navigation of the character among obstacles. This mechanic is central to research in this game and requires a constant collection of resources.

item.title: Titan Quest 2
item.description: Game Description Titan Quest 2 is a world that goes into ancient myths, where fate hangs in the balance, and the gods and monsters enter the battle. In the center of the story is Nemesis, the goddess of retaliation, who spoils the threads of fate and punishes everyone who challenges her. Your task is to pick up a weapon, challenge the divine forces and change the balance of fate itself. This role -playing game promises to give you a trip according to the rethinking version of Ancient Greece, where the gods, legendary monsters and ancient secrets are waiting for you.

item.title: Earth
item.description: Game Description Earth is a site-scrolling space shooter created for 16-bit equipment. The project transfers the player the pilot of the warship Azuso Takanashi in her campaign against alien invaders. Its central goal is to protect the Earth in a series of combat scripts. This title is a 2D-player with the main character, whose events unfold in the futuristic science fiction universe. The gameplay is presented from the arcade perspective.

item.title: Heartworm
item.description: Game Description Heartworm is a classic Survival Horror with elements of a psychological thriller. A girl named Sam with cut legs leads a closed lifestyle and does not want to leave her home. From the very beginning, the game hints that due to difficult childhood a young woman began to have problems with the psyche. Once she receives a video cassette with strange contents. Having looked at the record, the heroine suddenly comes to his senses in a completely different place.

item.title: Icoptic Journey
item.description: Game Description In the ICOPTIC Journey, the player begins his way, clinging to the protrusions in surreal, bright spaces and starting from the trampolines for the flight. Moving is a continuous, based on physics, a stream of actions that allows you to steam in colorful and psychedelic locations with a first -person view. The main task is to overcome stylized levels to achieve the intended goal. The path to the heights of skill in Icoptic Journey:

item.title: Panta Rhei - Guardian of Time
item.description: Game Description Panta Rhei - Guardian of Time tells about the journey of Fi, a guard expelled to the garden of the past. The chaotic force threatens to destroy the course of being, forcing the Glaverroy to leave his refuge. The reluctant protagonist will have to go to the source of time to confront this threat. This path will require him to face the shadows of the past and take a forgotten debt for the sake of saving the house.

item.title: PowerLust
item.description: Game Description Powerlust throws you into the open world, where you yourself form your fate. Create a unique character not connected by strict class restrictions. Become a magician of fire, owning a colossal sword, or an archer-nonsense, shedding death from afar. A huge selection of spells, weapons, abilities and skills will allow you to create your own game style and experiment with countless builds. But raw power is not all. A fight based on skills requires an exact choice of time and awareness.

item.title: Reflex Unit: Strike Ops
item.description: Game Description Reflex Unit: Strike Ops immerses in the future, destroyed by cataclysm and captured by powerful corporations. The player is headed by an elite detachment opposing the despotistical corporation Neotech, operating the remnants of civilization. The key gameplay consists in managing specialized equipment during various tactical operations. The tasks include daring rescue sorties, collecting key resources and direct attacks on enemy bases to undermine the power of the regime and struggle for freedom of the population.

item.title: CONTRACT Rush DX
item.description: Game Description Contract Rush DX represents a 2D-world, built on the battles in the style of run and shoot and platform navigation. The player will have to choose from the list of characters to perform missions in manually drawn environment. The action mixes the shooting with the study, and cartoon aesthetics are combined with frank blood images during battles. The central gaming cycle requires to accept and execute contracts, which promotes deep into the numerous conflicts of the world.

item.title: Demon Hunt
item.description: Game Description Demon Hunt is an action in which players pilot furs through landscapes flooded demons. The process is built on a combination of firing with the view of the Bullet Hell under the Rogue-Lite. Gamers go hunting, faced with numerous opponents and strong bosses in every sortie. During the battles, it is necessary to survive, collect resources and defeat the main enemy. This structure guarantees that each race in the game offers different trials and opportunities for development.

item.title: Grounded 2
item.description: Game Description Grounded 2 returns players to a reduced state in a much larger world. The new environment was the playground, now representing a spacious area from man -made structures and overgrown nature. Survival makes it necessary to create weapons and armor, as well as the construction of defensive bases to confront local threats. This title allows you to explore the open territory alone or in cooperative online mode. The main goal is to search for hidden secret secrets in the struggle for existence in this environment.

item.title: Sky The Scraper
item.description: Game Description Sky The Scraper tells about the history of a person named Sky, working as a rower of windows and pursuing personal ambitions. This game combines the action with movement on cables and the responsibilities of managing everyday life. It is necessary to go through a two -month period of hard work and care for yourself in order to influence the future. Its path forward is determined by overcoming the difficulties presented by his occupation and circumstances.

item.title: The Shaman's Ark
item.description: Game Description The Shaman’s Ark represents a world standing over an essence named the abyss. Once upon a time, people found a refuge on a structure called an ark, but the emptiness below now seeps back into their land. The shaman returns from darkness, armed only with a drum. The ancient melodies of the instrument function as a weapon, turning every battle with the ideas of the abyss into a rhythmic ritual committed on the verge of mortality.

item.title: Unlockers
item.description: Game Description Unlockers starts with a boy named Noah, an orphan waking up in a locked bedroom resembling a hotel room. In the door he found, there is no keyhole, creating an immediate obstacle. When studying the room, a sudden attack of dizziness makes him lose consciousness. Waking up, he finds an unfamiliar notebook and a locked box, deepening the secret of his conclusion in a strange complex where he is held.

item.title: Keytamine
item.description: Game Description Keytamine is an action focused on a rhythmic battle against the waves of opponents in the form of keyboards in the isometric world. Players enter into a fight with these opponents using a auto-clique mechanics, moving along the procedurally generated levels requiring tactical awareness. The main gameplay is built on a set of glasses, and survival and effective destruction of goals are the main tasks. The battle is a question of timing and reaction that integrates the Bullet Hell elements as the number of enemies grows and requires constant movement and control over the arena.

item.title: Primal Planet
item.description: Game Description Primal Planet begins with the struggle of a cave person for protecting his family from primitive predators. The narrative unfolds after the brutal attack of Ti-Rex, forcing the protagonist to be in a hostile environment and put the beginning of the history of survival. The plot combines the elements of prehistoric life with the advent of a UFO and an alien presence. As the truth is revealed, the character concludes unexpected unions, while from the very beginning the possibility of a joint local game is available.

item.title: Oxide Room 208
item.description: Game Description Oxide Room 208 places 8 people in an old laboratory under the control of figures named Doc. Heroes are forcibly connected to his experience Oxide - a project with an unstable carrier named Eve. Her reason could not stand it, forcing experience to give rise to an organic environment that physically deforming the whole complex. This biomechanical situation, combining the motel and laboratory, was in the past a place of terrible deeds, and now the main goal for the captives is to find the door 208 for survival.

item.title: Slayer: The Demon Haunted World
item.description: Game Description Slayer: The Demon Haunted World represents the world emerging from the period, which historians called the Aera of ash and dust. The belief in the end of this era was erroneous, because the shadows awaken again. A girl born under the moon and possessing white hair is the only one who can fight back the threat of fallen stars. She enters the tower for a battle with this evil, while the Universe balances on the verge of darkness.

item.title: Ed and Edda: Grand Prix - Racing Champions
item.description: Game Description Ed and Edda: Grand Prix - Racing Champions - this is a racing game with the participation of Muscles from the European Park. There are 8 characters to choose from, including the main characters of Ed and Eddo from the Grand Prix of Europe. Railways take place on the tracks laid around the attractions of the continent. You can withstand computer counterparts or challenge three friends in local mode with the separation of the screen by arranging a direct competition in driver’s skills.

item.title: Killing Floor 3
item.description: Game Description Killing Floor 3 throws you headlong into the gloomy 2091. The shadow megacorporation created a monstrous army of bioenginery creatures entitled “Zeda”. You join NightFall, a rebel group with a serious mentality to “kill with fire”. As a specialist NightFall, you will unite with four other gamers to destroy these Zedov in a tireless struggle for survival. This is not a single riot. In Killing Floor 3, the main thing is to work in a team and achieve success.

item.title: Look mum no computer
item.description: Game Description Look Mum No Computer is a twin-style shooter, the action of which takes place in the Saldersworth universe. Players take on the role of Sam, working together with the cosmo-cosmo companion to combat mechanisms that have gone under control. The mission requires penetrating these devices to repair them and direct confrontation of chaos. The journey includes the execution of quests from the inhabitants of the machine worlds and a fight with large -scale bosses.

item.title: Wuchang: Fallen feathers
item.description: Game Description Wuchang: Fallen feathers is not an ordinary history lesson. Of course, you will pass along the insidious path of China from the late dynasty of mines, a period abundant by warring groups and public riots. But this is not just a revived textbook. Get ready for a wild trip, in which historical personalities mix with fantastic creatures, erasing the boundaries between reality and supernatural. Stand in the place of the protagonist - a character shrouded in a secret who fights with a forgotten past.

item.title: Dinosaurs Dominion
item.description: Game Description Dinosaurs Dominion is a single -user adventure focused on territorial conquest. The player has to control the dinosaur for battles, evolution and gradual seizure of control over the environment. Progress in each passage is earned through the study of the world and victory in battle. The defeat returns the creature by the beginning of his journey, which is a key feature of Roguelite design. The choice of 14 accessible species, from agile scouts to massive predators, provides different approaches to this survival cycle.

item.title: Slidemagi
item.description: Game Description Slidemagi is a duel between the two magicians on the 10x10 board, where units move by shifting the entire grid lines. In one move, the player performs one action: moves a row or applies a spell. This solution is central to the tactical pattern of battle. Following this, all controlled fighters on the field simultaneously attack in four main directions in the presence of goals. This tactical game offers several modes for single and multiplayer competitions.

item.title: Undermine 2
item.description: Game Description Undermine 2 expands the Action-Roguelike formula, sending the players back to their underground world. Two conflicts are simultaneously unfolding within the limits of Developer: King Faraam IV is trying to return his kingdom, and the invisible war between demonic creatures permeates the very reality. The path begins with the role of a peasant, who has to move around this world, where human political squabbles serve as a distraction from deeper cosmic intrigues.

item.title: BUCCANEERS SHIPSHAPE
item.description: Game Description Buccaneers Shipshape is a sideling-sling beat ‘em up, where players pursue the goal of returning the stolen vessel and its treasure map. The gameplay is focused on battles with enemy looters and obtaining objects from civilians. The characters call on manual parrots to help during collisions. This arcade action develops through a series of levels and supports a local cooperative up to 4 participants on one system. The basis is a slasher with sword battles as central mechanics.

item.title: Descenders Next
item.description: Game Description Descenders Next is a sports action combining Roguelike mechanics with third -person views. Ryders use snowboards and mauntinboards to move along spacious, procedurally created locations. The project offers an open world study in several biomes: from snowy peaks to winding ground routes and specially equipped parks. Each race offers a new path, since internal mechanics create unique routes for every attempt. This approach also includes the elements of Tower Defense and the first -person type for certain classes, providing a diverse game process.

item.title: Expedition to the BackRooms
item.description: Game Description Expedition to the BackRooms puts the player in the place of the ASYNC research team member. This group is sent to study the place of the alleged anomaly, and the search is brought into a parallel measurement from the interconnected rooms and corridors. This world consists of the same type of buildings with a yellow tint, and the lighting is provided by the roar of ceiling fluorescent lamps. Gamers move through this labyrinth -like structure to detect artifacts and tips.

item.title: Phantom Squad
item.description: Game Description Phantom Squad is a cooperative shooter with a view of 1-4 players, combining tactics in real time and battles with high rates. Before the collision, groups must formulate the assault plan, using gaming tools for marking implementation routes, tasks and entry points during the operation. Constant voice communication serves as the main element of the coordination of maneuvers and the reaction to the change of operational situation. Gamers create a unit for the execution of these cruel tasks in which each solution directly affects survival.

item.title: Shadow Labyrinth
item.description: Game Description Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action-platform that draws inspiration in the classic Pac-man, offering a fresh look at the familiar gameplay. Gamers enter the place of swordsman No. 8, which is revived by a floating yellow ball named Puck. Together they move around the alien world filled with relics and the remnants of past wars. The new situation opens up many difficulties, enemies and secrets, turning, it would seem, a simple labyrinth into a world of secrets and dangers.

item.title: DUST RADERS
item.description: Game Description Dust Raiders puts the player in the role of the manager on the lawless, post -apocalyptic wasteland, where control over resources is the main task. The plot originates after the Sawblade attack, which led to the loss of the oil refinery, the death of the Viktor’s ally and the dissolution of the original team. Left without fuel and equipment, it is necessary to collect a functional machine from scrap metal to start recovery.

item.title: Forest Heroes
item.description: Game Description Forest Heroes combines Tower Defense elements with Roguelike Deckbuilding. The place of action is the Nokflufol, the forest that flourished under the auspices of the elves who own mushroom magic. However, the offended oak imposed a curse on the ground, distorting it. In the role of an elf-guardian, the player’s task is to rally the allies-living ones for rebuke. The main mission is to defend the operating base and clean the surrounding area from the influence of the curse in order to restore the area to its original state.

item.title: Neon Abyss 2
item.description: Game Description Neon Abyss 2 makes gamers pass procedurally generated levels. The game takes place in a futuristic cyberpunk setting, the title offers a unique mixture of Roguelike mechanics and a stressed platformer action. Users examine the depths of the abyss - a chaotic environment filled with enemies, traps and secrets that are waiting in the wings. Each passage is a new challenge, since the levels in the Title are generated randomly, which prevents two identical ones.

item.title: Robocop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business
item.description: Game Description Robocop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business - this is a separate addition, the action of which takes place after stripping Detroit from criminal groups. Hope for a calm life appears with the construction of Omnitower, a new residential complex from OCP. However, this peaceful undertaking interrupts the capture of the building with a detachment of elite mercenaries, who turned it into an impregnable fortress. Robokop has to storm the tower in order to neutralize the threat and restore the legality, using all his arsenal for this.

item.title: Everstrife
item.description: Game Description Everstrife combines a battle with a look from the top and strategy for building a deck, placing players in locations filled with shells. Development depends on the system of skills based on Roguelike maps and elements. The central place in the gameplay is occupied by a synthesis mechanic that allows you to combine basic abilities. With 30 fundamental spells, gamers can generate more than 2000 of their options, so that each race offers new tactical solutions.

item.title: Noobs are coming
item.description: Game Description Noobs Are Coming puts the player in the place of the final boss in the arena, where he will have to fight off the waves of opponents. The main task is to withstand the gradually intensifying attacks of attackers called nobs for a 30-minute round. A list of characters-bosses, which includes a giant worm, queen of spiders or seductive succubus, is offered to choose from. After that, it is necessary to create a unique assembly, equipping the hero with special skills and combined dozens of different attacks for constructing protective tactics.

item.title: Star Rift Saga
item.description: Game Description Star Rift Saga places a player on a distant foreign world, where spatial faults break the fabric of reality. These cosmic gaps threaten to release in the galaxy the devouring planets of essence, which becomes the main task. The mission consists in moving in many biomes to confront these creatures and the subsequent closure of spatial anomalies. The battles require accurate platforming, the use of invulnerable jerks and the ability to fly in order to defeat various opponents and their leaders.

item.title: Seacret 1
item.description: Game Description Seacret 1 is a sandbox in the 17th century Caribbean, where players are engaged in trade, battles or management. The economy here functions in real time, and the prices and volumes of goods in each individual city are constantly fluctuating. The journey begins with one modest tartan, but over time you can expand your flotilla to three vessels, including fast slices or more impressive galleons. Strategic planning of commercial routes is becoming a key basis for the accumulation of wealth, vital for conducting operations in an extensive open world.

item.title: Koro-San's Home Wan! Derby
item.description: Game Description Koro-San’s Home Wan! Derby puts the player in the role of repelling during a special baseball event. The character Koro-san organizes the game and invites other Hololive gamers, but the situation arises: all the audience want to be pitchens. Such a arrangement leaves Koro-san with the only figure on the home base. The appointed listeners take on the entire defense in the field, allowing you to concentrate exclusively on the blows.

item.title: Mycopunk
item.description: Game Description Mycopunk puts players in the New Atlas Hazard Crew, a detachment of robots hired by Saxon Corporation. This group of exterinators is directed to fight a fungal threat that is spreading through the planet. The crew performs these tasks to ensure its existence and avoid disposal. These instructions also help to find out the details of the planetary biological disaster and the role of Saxon in it. The gameplay in Mycopunk is built on the implementation of missions and deep customization of equipment.

item.title: Nelumbra
item.description: Game Description Nelumbra puts the player in the role of the bearer of light, character who fell into a temporary loop without memories of the past. The main task is to fight for the truth of one’s own existence, and the price of this is unknown. Survival is built on the use of rhythmic car autocat and jerks as the surrounding light is extinct, which steadily pumps stress with each action.

item.title: OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression
item.description: Game Description OUR WAR: FirePower Suppression is a flight shooter in which players use continuous fire to neutralize enemy forces. The story of the Title is submitted after 30 plot chapters, describing the war between the human faction and the essence of the fat bird from the parallel world. Combat operations take place on various three -dimensional locations, each with a unique relief that affects the tactical approach to clashes.

item.title: Patapon 1+2 Replay
item.description: Game Description Patapon 1+2 Replay puts a player at the head of creatures called Patapones. As their deity, you give orders, tapping combinations on 4 mystical drums, and this mechanics underlie the entire process. Each bit - Pata, Pon, Don and Chuck - develops into rhythmic sequences for commands of movement, attack and defense. The goal is to bring the tribe to the expedition to the location of the Hushraele, overcoming obstacles.

item.title: Dr. Gloom's Lab
item.description: Game Description Dr. Gloom’s Lab puts a player in the future of Jackson Blair, a character who goes to a secluded research center. The plot originates at the entrance, offering a first -person gameplay in which the study becomes a key element of promotion. Gamers have to find and distribute limited reserves for survival, moving through the internal spaces of the structure. The central goal is the consistent clarification of events inside the complex and a collision with the direct consequences of its previous operations.

item.title: EVERY DAY WE FIGHT
