item.description: Game Description TheCarX Street car simulator allows you to build your own car and hit the streets to conquer the whole city. The metropolis is presented on a huge scale, including its surroundings: city streets, industrial area, picturesque highways, etc. CarX Streets features drifting, high-speed chases, heavy traffic and intense competition in online races. The main feature of the game is the possibility of deep car customization and wide tuning possibilities.

item.title: DEATH IN UNISON
item.description: Game Description DEATH IN UNISON is a co-op survival adventure game set in an isolated rehabilitation institute on Corton Island. Here gamers will have to survive in the fight against some of the most dangerous criminals in the world, many of whom have supernatural powers. Users must perform their prison duties alone or with a partner, relying primarily on radio communications to navigate the treacherous environment. Gameplay in DEATH IN UNISON revolves around completing administrative tasks and protecting yourself from hostile prisoners.

item.title: ENDLESS DAYS Z
item.description: Game Description ENDLESS DAYS Z immerses gamers in a desolate, post-apocalyptic world devastated by DeltaVirus-7. As the leader of a group of survivors, you must overcome treacherous obstacles, collect vital samples, and confront hordes of the undead as you desperately search for a cure. The gripping narrative and intense gameplay make the game appealing to fans of survival horror and action games. The gameplay of ENDLESS DAYS Z is based on exploration, combat and resource management.

item.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
item.description: Game Description Gori: Cuddly Carnage is a dynamic action game with platformer and horror elements. You find yourself locked in with crazed toys out for blood. Using a special surf, you will have to cut circles around the location and chop up monsters. You will play as an anthropomorphic kitten riding a hoverboard. Chop unicorns and don’t get caught by a huge gorilla, eager to devour the protagonist. The gameplay of Gori: Cuddly Carnage has been jokingly described as Skate and Slash.

item.title: Gundam Breaker 4
item.description: Game Description GUNDAM BREAKER 4 hits the gaming scene with a bang as part of the heist gaming franchise. It’s all about building and fighting with a set of Gundam models, a concept fans are very familiar with. However, adventure games breathe new life into this formula, offering a deeper and more expansive experience. Customization is the cornerstone of the game. An extensive library of over 250 base sets provides the foundation for creating the Gunpla of your dreams.

item.title: Squirrel with a Gun
item.description: Game Description Squirrel with a Gun offers a unique experience. Users control a squirrel armed with a gun. Target? Collect golden acorns in a secret underground vault. The squirrel that haunts the neighbors becomes a hero. Gamers move through a sandbox filled with puzzles and enemies. The facility serves as a playground for chaos. To survive, the squirrel uses weapons, claws and teeth. The gameplay combines shooting and platforming. Users collect golden acorns - a squirrel’s obsession.

item.title: Star Command Galaxies
item.description: Game Description Star Command Galaxies is a space simulator in which you play as a ship captain. You need to build your own shuttle, recruit staff and go explore the randomly generated expanses of outer space. Manage your staff, collect resources, fight the alien threat and upgrade your ship. Clear the galaxy from enemies and various parasites. Fight pirates, zombies and many other opponents. You need to monitor the status of your team.

item.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
item.description: Game Description Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash is a colorful spin-off that departs from the traditional racing focus. The title is evolving into a playful, party-oriented title. Gamers are immersed in a pixelated world teeming with familiar Umamusume. The Slapdash Grand Prix, the centerpiece, unfolds like a chaotic school festival. Four different events promise laughter, competition and unexpected twists. The pixel relay will spark the fun. Time plays a crucial role in Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash.

item.title: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble
item.description: Game Description Kamitsubaki City Ensemble represents a post -apocalyptic world in which music is the key to revival. Girls of artificial intelligence, awakened after the cataclysm, use the magic of songs to restore the destroyed reality. However, their existence is still shrouded in secret. Advencura musical library boasts a variety of compositions from Kamitsubaki Studio and the Musical Isotope series. More than 48 compositions in the basic version of the game and many additional tracks in seasonal pass allow users to explore an extensive musical landscape.

item.title: Supermoves
item.description: Game Description Supermoves - This parkour party promises wild fun. Users sprint, jump and grind the rails in intense challenges. Bomb Tag, Rising Tide and Royale modes offer different thrills. Up to forty gamers can race, pursue and compete. Makea Games' level editor allows users to create their own experiences. Makeaverse is waiting for you. Everyone can dive in, build and play. Supermoves combines competition and creativity. Casual players and parkour professionals will find their place.

item.title: PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1
item.description: Game Description PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1 is a journey through many worlds as Phil goes on a quest for justice. This is an exciting adventure in which gamers must return what was stolen by a strange race of invaders. The story touches on themes of friendship, love and the essence of humanity. Users mine resources, fight enemies and choose between direct combat and stealth. Gameplay involves jumping on platforms, shooting, and solving puzzles.

item.title: The Land of the Magnates
item.description: Game Description The Land of the Magnates tells the story of fallen prince Shahbaz, who is tasked with restoring a kingdom shrouded in darkness. The project does not hand the players a sword, but instead puts a sitar in their hands. This is not a hack-and-slash adventure game. No, this is a journey of melody and power, where puzzles replace sword fights. Shahbaz’s adventure takes place through fantastical landscapes. The black forest, the damned expanses, tests your courage.

item.title: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far
item.description: Game Description 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far is a real-time strategy game developed by Petroglyph Games, a continuation of the 8-Bit Armies series. Gamers lead modern military forces across various battlefields, participating in land, sea and air battles. The project offers more than two dozen missions, online skirmishes and cooperative play. A base construction system has been implemented in which players build structures, unlock units and launch attacks. The game is designed for both new and experienced RTS players with an easy to learn interface but a challenging skill ceiling.

item.title: Rum and Gun
item.description: Game Description Rum and Gun uses a pirate theme as its setting. The hero travels through the lands located in the Indian Ocean, fighting on land with people and monsters. He is trying to stop the captain, who has enlisted the help of evil forces. He also has to learn the secrets of the Drunken God. The plot is presented with jokes and self-irony. History is divided into acts. This is an isometric shooter and action game with role-playing elements.

item.title: Toy Shire
item.description: Game Description Toy Shire revives a children’s room in a strategic battle. Bluespy Studios came up with this curious name by putting the player in the role of a defender. No pistols or grenades. Instead, plastic warriors and cardboard fortresses dominate the battlefield. The territory of the child is becoming a zone of hostilities. Tables, corners and floor of the bedroom turn into strategic landscapes. Gamers erect toy towers, these bizarre structures built from childhood residues.

item.title: Selene's Unbearable Night
item.description: Game Description Selene’s Unbearable Night is a third-person survival horror game that immerses gamers in a tense and atmospheric atmosphere. The title tells the story of Selena, a woman who finds herself in a difficult situation and is forced to overcome various dangers in order to survive. Users will have to search for key items, solve complex puzzles and confront numerous threats in order to complete the game. Selene’s Unbearable Night’s narrative unfolds through dialogue and cinematography, offering a deep dive into the characters' motivations and backstories.

item.title: Finding Mosey
item.description: Game Description InFinding Mosey, your feline companion Mosey has mysteriously disappeared. You go in search of him, and your path will depend on the choice you make. Developed by youpiepoopie, this single-player third-person RPG offers a refreshing blend of exploration, storytelling, and whimsical interactions. The search begins. Imagine waking up during a peaceful hike to find Mosey nowhere to be found. This seemingly simple premise turns into an exciting adventure. The landscape is rife with secrets, and whether your character’s path is destructive or peaceful will determine how the quest unfolds.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong
item.description: Game Description Black Myth: Wukong is a role-playing game based on the famous Chinese novel Journey to the West, written back in the 16th century. The gameplay is a journey through a semi-open world, reminiscent of a metroidvania. The developers cite the Souls series as their main source of inspiration. The story centers on a hero named Sun Wukong, who is also known as the Monkey King. He travels through a fantasy world, simultaneously fighting with various phantasmagoric creatures.

item.title: Intravenous 2
item.description: Game Description Intravenous 2 immerses you in the world of cruel intrigues and intense action. Play for Sean, desperately trying to save his abducted father, and Steve, a grumbling former military with a dark past. Their unlikely union is based on a common goal: to pass the labyrinth of the underworld, complete secrets, lies and mortal danger. But how you can handle this insidious Odyssey depends only on you. Will you be a ghost, fluttering in shadows and manipulating environment in your interests?

item.title: Crime Scene Cleaner
item.description: Game Description Crime Scene Cleaner is an unusual simulator in which you clean up traces of a crime. As soon as the customer calls you, and usually this is the mafia boss, you need to rush to the crime scene and wield a brush, a mop and many other tools. If you find yourself in a room full of corpses and blood, pull yourself together and do the job professionally. Don’t give investigators a chance to find the killer.

item.title: Dark and Deep
item.description: Game Description Dark and Deep begins with Samuel Jajj, a listener of a conspiracystoal podcast with the same name. Transfer themes penetrate his world, transferring the hero to a new landscape filled with threats. This first -person horror is concentrated on the study and resolution of puzzles. The key task is to survive in an altered reality and reveal a conspiracy that underlies it. Samuel has to withstand the inhabitants of this place, moving around the environment in search of answers.

item.title: Nova Drift
item.description: Game Description Nova Drift is a top-down action RPG adventure. The gamer has the opportunity to test his strength in piloting a space fighter, forced to fight enemies that are superior in numbers and firepower. The spaceship uses unusual technologies; it is created using biomechanics, which means that it seems to be alive and is constantly changing both in appearance and in terms of available weapons. Thanks to the addition of artificial intelligence trained in procedural random generation, the developers from a small indie formation were able to achieve almost endless replayability.

item.title: Shoulders of Giants
item.description: Game Description Shoulders of Giants is a sci-fi action roguelike played from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in a world inhabited by humanoid animals and monsters. In the story, two heroes want to save the Universe from heat death. They embark on a journey to restore balance to the galaxy. They are helped by an owl, a monkey, a panda and a scientist. In this title, the user will have to control two characters at once - a large fur and an anthropomorphic frog sitting on it.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Into the Pit immerses players in time-bending horror. Oswald, bored with everyday life, stumbles upon a portal to the past in the ball pit of an old pizzeria. His desire for thrills quickly turns into a nightmare when he finds himself trapped in a deadly game of cat and mouse. The player will have to move between different eras, piece together clues and elude relentless animatronic pursuers.

item.title: Fish Hero
item.description: Game Description Fish Hero is an adventure based on physics, focused on parking, where players control the water being outside its natural element. The key task is to throw the character up to reach the top. Progress entirely depends on the development of a special slap movement, which allows you to move through the platforms and gain a height. This action is the only method for moving through a three -dimensional world that requires accurate calculation and understanding of inertia.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: 7 Days to Die
item.description: Game Description In7 Days to Die you will need the ability to loot, kill other players, take loot, build buildings, craft items, shoot accurately and keep track of time, because in the open world there is a night in which zombies and other undead sharpen their attention . A horror first-person shooter that combines city building, multiplayer, survival, tower defense and character leveling in an RPG style. Despite the fact that a severe epidemic has struck the world, you will be able to kill animals to take their meat and skin.

item.title: Pigromance
item.description: Game Description Pigromance tells about the efforts of one pig to avoid turning into a food product, this is a story about the escape contrary to the established expectations. The action starts on a farm, where the piglets were previously behind the fence, in the usual environment. Over time, this design of the content succumbed, initiating the mass departure of animals from the agricultural limits in search of an alternative to their prepared role.

item.title: Exophobia
item.description: Game Description Exophobia is a first -person pixel shooter in which you will go to explore a spaceship. The shuttle fell to the surface of an unknown planet. Here you will encounter the hordes of alien opponents. The game is made in retro-stylistic, drawing inspiration in arcade shooters of the 80s. Explore the station and find out the background of the inhabitants of the planet, as well as try to find out what caused the shipwreck.

item.title: LOCKDOWN Protocol
item.description: Game Description LOCKDOWN Protocol throws players into a high-stakes world of deception and cooperation. The title combines real-time action and communication, creating a dynamic experience for groups of three to eight people. The idea is simple: players cooperate to complete tasks within a strict time limit. Beneath the surface of unity, however, lies a sinister undercurrent. Trust is a fragile commodity in this environment. Every interaction offers a chance to gather information or sow discord.

item.title: Acre Crisis
item.description: Game Description Acre CRISIS transfers players in 1992, placing them in the AKR area in the jungle of the Amazon. The Brazilian Military Police Brigade is going to this area to investigate a series of deaths caused by wild animals, as well as reports of a meeting with cryptids. Upon arrival, the soldiers were in direct confrontation with a group of hungry dinosaurs, which was very different from their initial task.

item.title: Dungeons of Hinterberg
item.description: Game Description Dungeons of Hinterberg is not your typical dungeon crawl. Sure, there are monsters and loot, but this game adds a plot twist - the idyllic Austrian Alps. Yes, you heard right. Just imagine: fresh mountain air, charming townspeople and… oh yes, dungeons teeming with monsters. Welcome to Hinterberg, a tourist hotspot with a hidden side hustle: monster slaying. So, you are Louise, a savvy lawyer, ready to ditch your corporate routine for a vacation with a twist.

item.title: Nevergrind Online
item.description: Game Description Nevergrind online immerses players in a multi -user role -playing game by dungeons, where the search for treasures and the extermination of monsters come to the fore. Players can climb the career ladder as usual or challenge to the hardcore regime, and all this without microtransactions. The game combines the classic RPG elements with unique turns, creating an experience that stands out from the crowd. Once in the world of Wandamor, the players find themselves in the Kingdom of Edenburg, the once calm kingdom, which is now besieging the Dark Forces.

item.title: Everafter Falls
item.description: Game Description Everafter Falls combines a heating simulator with elements of role -playing adventure. Gamers grow crops, bred animals and catch fish in a serene rural area. However, there is a more gloomy background. Terrible creatures that require combat skill live in the dungeons. A unique development system replaces traditional experience with mysterious cards. Gamers feed these cards to a mysterious creature, contributing to the growth of the character. The project encourages cooperation.

item.title: Blade and Sorcery
item.description: Game Description Blade and Sorcery is a first-person fantasy action game focused on realistic hand-to-hand combat physics. You play as a hero who knows how to fight with melee and long-range weapons, as well as magical abilities. There are three classes to choose from: Warrior, Ranger and Wizard. The gameplay is adapted for virtual reality helmets Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality. The gameplay is based on body physics and fair hitboxes.

item.title: Jrago II Guardians of Eden
item.description: Game Description Jrago 2 Guardians of Eden offers players to unite in a company up to 4 people for battle with a revived darkness. Heroes form a detachment of guards in order to exterminate demonic forces and return the light to their world. The gameplay combines two -dimensional platforming and elements of the role action on a spacious card. This project, which is a direct continuation of the Jrago The Demon Hunter, expands the basic Hack and Slash mechanics within the framework of a large metroid that focuses on joint actions.

item.title: Legend of Mortal
item.description: Game Description InLegend of Mortal you have to become a nobody in the Tang Man sector. Not a prophetic hero, not a legendary warrior - you’re just trying to survive in a world on the edge of the abyss. But even lowlifes have it tough, right? This is what Legend of Mortal is all about: your decisions determine the fate of you and those around you. Think of it this way: every meeting, every battle, every seemingly insignificant conversation is a twist in the kaleidoscope.

item.title: The Feathered Serpent
item.description: Game Description The Feathred Serpent immerses in the lost world, where battles with dinosaurs, magic goals and giant beetles are coming. The contract with the Death Deity guarantees resurrection after each failure, allowing you to make new attempts to achieve the only goal. Each revival brings other objects, accidentally generated levels and the development of history. The main task remains unchanged throughout all cycles - to defeat the powerful creature that gave the name to this title.

item.title: Wayfinder
item.description: Game Description Wayfinder is an online action role-playing adventure game in which gamers become Wayfinders, using unique abilities to fight the hostile force that has taken over their world. The game emphasizes co-op, allowing users to team up with friends to enhance their abilities and manage their adventures. The world of Evenor, in which the action takes place, has been destroyed, and gamers will have to navigate it, collecting valuable materials and creating items that will help them in their search.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Jesus Christ Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Jesus Christ Simulator, gamers find themselves in the role of Jesus, who has to solve the problems facing humanity. The action takes place in a huge American city where users use their divine abilities to create miracles and bring positive changes to people’s lives. These forces include flights, exorcism and various supernatural abilities that allow users to interact with the environment and its inhabitants in unique ways.

item.title: Nine Sols
item.description: Game Description Adventures inNine Sols take players into an oriental fantasy setting where they will have to fight against 9 Sols. The game is a 2D platformer with soulslick elements, where you have to face unique bosses. Events take place on the territory of New Kunlun, which is a refuge for survivors. The ancient gods abandoned mortals, forcing them to confront dangerous monsters. A hero named Yi has arrived from the distant past to defeat mythological creatures.

item.title: WARNO
item.description: Game Description Tactical battles inWARNO take place in real time, where users will be able to take control of modern combat vehicles and go to the front, plunging into the Third World War. The game is made in the genre of strategy and army command simulator, where you need to think through the movement of units and observe the events taking place. The storyline is about a coup that occurs after Gorbachev leaves, creating a tense conflict between states in 1989.

item.title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
item.description: Game Description InGhost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT the twilight of the 13th century begins. The Mongol Empire massacred many peoples as part of a campaign whose goal was to conquer the East. Between mainland Japan and the mighty Mongol fleet, commanded by the legendary General Khotun Khan, lies only the island of Tsushima. And he is conquered, small villages are destroyed. Samurai Jin Sakai remained the last of the great clan.

item.title: You are peter shorts
item.description: Game Description You are Peter Shorts immerses users in a tense situation, when Peter suddenly captures during grilling on a lazy Saturday day. A secret agency comes into business, which takes him to the mysterious cloning center. In the role of Peter, gamers should navigate in this strange, hostile environment, trying to escape with the help of newly created clones. The game, made in the style of Metroidvania, has many rooms that need to be explored, and a number of shock clones that have to fight with.

item.title: ANIMAL WELL
item.description: Game Description InANIMAL WELL players must explore a vast labyrinth created in pixel art. Players will interact with the interactive environment, pick up objects and combine them with each other, solve spatial puzzles, overcome landscape obstacles and much more. The character has to move around two-dimensional locations with a side view, periodically encountering dangerous monsters. It is necessary to illuminate dark areas on the map by lighting special candles. In the process of passing ANIMAL WELL, users have to explore the world, which consists of a large number of intricate riddles and labyrinths.

item.title: Rabbit and Steel
item.description: Game Description Rabbit and Steel is a co-op action roguelike that will take you into epic battles. Choose your class, gather your bunny friends and fight to the top of Moon Peak. Months ago, all ties with the Moonlight Kingdom were severed. It is reported that the city’s residents are attacking all newcomers. Exploratory expeditions are repulsed or go missing. Every night, a huge white tower appears in the center of the city, reaching towards the stars.

item.title: Genome Guardian
item.description: Game Description Genome Guardian transfers gamers to the environment, where a microscopic becomes a scene for a high -octane action. This is a game where the usual meets the unusual, offering the world filled with microscopic organisms, some of which are harmless, while others are far from the case. A distinctive feature is that it is based on the mixing and selection of DNA nucleotides to create bio -weapons, which serves you the main protection from the hostile environment.

item.title: V Rising
item.description: Game Description Waking up inV Rising, the hero as a vampire must hunt for blood, while simultaneously avoiding direct sunlight. The survival slasher film puts you in the shoes of a bloodsucker who wakes up in his own castle and must regain his possession and authority while operating in a vast open world full of secrets. Here you have to conquer the lands of the living, unite with allies to complete the task.

item.title: Hades 2
item.description: Game Description Hades II, the sequel to the award-winning roguelike dungeon crawler, takes players beyond the underworld. You play as Melina, a princess of the underworld who, using dark sorcery, battles the Titan of Time. Supergiant Games builds on the success of the original game with intense action and endless replayability. Explore a deeper mythical world rooted in Greek myth and witchcraft. The story unfolds through victories and failures, keeping you on your toes.

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: MoonLight Pulse
item.description: Game Description MoonLight Pulse is an adventure action, the action of which takes place inside the biological systems of a colossal cosmic turtle. The player will send a team of healing agents in the surrealist world, protecting the arrangement of the alien parasites. The basis of the gameplay lies in instant switching between the heroes, which allows you to tactically apply their special movements and battle skills. The task will fail if at least one agent perish, but the members of the detachment can save each other out of dangerous situations.

item.title: Nordic ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
item.description: Game Description Nordic ashes: survivors of ragnarok - Dynamic adventure with elements of action and simplified cuckle. The plot is inspired by Scandinavian legends and motives. The main character finds himself in a dangerous environment in which he will face hordes of enemy and deadly creatures. He needs to stay alive among hundreds of opponents and traps, gradually pumping his abilities and finding more powerful equipment. The central character will move between worlds, fight with powerful bosses, overcome traps and find objects of equipment.

item.title: Another Crab's Treasure
item.description: Game Description Another Crab’s Treasure is an exciting underwater adventure created by AGGRO CRAB. You take on the role of a hermit crab named Creel, who goes on a dangerous treasure hunt to get back his stolen shell. In this unique underwater kingdom, on the verge of destruction, garbage is not only part of life, but also a valuable resource used to create fashionable outfits and weapons. However, with the garbage comes a mysterious danger - “slurry” - which threatens to destroy the entire ocean.

item.title: Bellwright
item.description: Game Description Bellwright throws you into a world of rebellion and intrigue. Finding yourself in prison for a heinous crime, you must not only clear your name, but also organize a revolution against a tyrannical ruler. Build and manage settlements, collect resources and recruit villagers into your ranks. Each new adept brings valuable skills, strengthening your rebellion and unlocking new technologies for your cities. Combat is based on skill and focus.

item.title: Dead Island 2
item.description: Game Description Dead Island 2 is a continuation of the first-person zombie action game of the same name. The events of the game start a few months after the end of the first game. The virus has reached sunny California. The entire territory was cordoned off by US troops. Dead Island 2 includes many features that expand on the ideas of Left 4 Dead. The hero finds himself in the center of a zombie apocalypse and somehow miraculously survives.

item.title: No Rest for the Wicked
item.description: Game Description No Rest for the Wicked immerses players in a world ravaged by death and despair. Developed by Moon Studios, the creators of Ori and the Blind Forest, this action RPG promises challenging combat and deep human storytelling. The kingdom mourns the death of King Harol, leaving his untested son Magnus on the throne. Meanwhile, an ancient plague known as the Blight returns, corrupting the land and its inhabitants. Amid the chaos, Madrigal Celine, hungry for power in the church, seeks to use the crisis for his own selfish purposes.

item.title: Incursion Red River
item.description: Game Description Incursion Red River immerses you in the ruthless world of modern Vietnam, devastated by civil war. In the role of a mercenary of private military corporations (PMCs), profitable on chaos, you will participate in tense tactical shootings, reveal hidden truths and fight for survival in history, which unfolds in the course of the game. Combat with two friends for a cooperative game or go alone, like a lone wolf.

item.title: Underspace
item.description: Game Description Underspace is an adventure action in the open world. The gameplay proposes to explore the open spaces of the open space, fighting with other combat shuttles, alien creatures, etc. Take the trading and pumping of your own ship. Openvorld Underspace is fully created manually. Each star system includes its own characteristics and biomes. You have to explore the galaxy called CROFT. You can go to the adventure as alone, so with friends.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto ofBuckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: Quit Today
item.description: Game Description QUIT TODAY is a 2D sid-screen in the action genre with a setting of a corporate workplace. The plot starts on ordinary morning, when the central character enters the office and finds out that all colleagues are confident in his imminent dismissal. Employees perceive this as a betrayal and communicate with him. First, the hero fights off his portfolio, trying to figure out what is happening. Upon learning of the dark affairs in the company, he decides to break through all departments with a battle in order to submit an application for care.

item.title: Content Warning
item.description: Game Description Content Warning throws players into the world of horror content creation. Team up with friends, create your own pixelated face using the in-game ASCII customizer, and grab your gear. Then descend into the spooky Old World using the diving bell. The Old World is crawling with creepy, physics-based monsters and cursed relics just waiting to be captured on camera. Capture as much creepy content as you can before you run out of oxygen, your camera dies, or worse, your friends become fodder for the monsters.

item.title: Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi
item.description: Game Description In Transylvania, Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi immerses in the world of 1451, captured by the army of Prince Dracula. The horde of zombies, werewolves and demonic creatures threatens to establish eternal night on Earth. To confront this darkness, two champions appear, ready to perform justice. Abbot Dorin, a monk-warrior, unites with Irina Dracula-a vampire-pyroman and a descendant of the very lord to whom they hunt. Their task is to drop the army of the dead and challenge Dracula in his own castle.

item.title: Macross -shooting Insight-
item.description: Game Description Macross -shooting Insight - This is a title in which the rapid action of the sword fighting is embodied in a fascinating form. The control of the transformable Veritech fighters, immersing gamers into high -tied missions with lateral scrolling, is based. Target? To fight the formidable forces of Zentradi is a task that requires accuracy, quick reflexes and confident ownership of various mechanics that the game offers. Are you a fan of the Mecha genre or just like good Sidskrollers, this adventure will not leave a place for boredom.

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description: Game Description Outpost: Infinity Siege is a fun sci-fi first-person shooter with elements of base building and tower defense. You command the Mobile Outpost and go with the Protoslug Cannon to deeply explore the forbidden zone of Cygnet, where many dangers await you. Collect unique weapon units and strengthen the firepower of the outpost that is fighting with you. This game combines elements of TD, FPS and RTS at the same time, making the gameplay incredibly exciting.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2
item.description: Game Description Dragon’s Dogma 2 takes players on a single-player adventure, immersing them in an action-packed action RPG where choices define the path. Players are encouraged to customize their experience, from the appearance of their Arisen to strategic decisions in combat and party composition. Throughout the quest, players are accompanied by pawns - mysterious creatures that simulate the multiplayer experience of a single-player adventure, enriching the gameplay with a variety of perspectives.

item.title: Machick
item.description: Game Description Machick puts a player against the organized force of anti -magic toads aimed at destroying the forest. The main task is to stop this army and regain control of the territory. The gameplay is built on the cycle: Gamer creates personal magic sticks, crushes enemies and gets experience from them. The experience gained is to buy improvements that allow each attempt to move further deep into the conflict. The whole trip is a process of collecting resources to approach the ultimate goal.

item.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt
item.description: Game Description Midnight Ghost Hunt is a creepy version of hide and seek in which players will have to catch ghosts or, on the contrary, drive away people who disturbed the peace of the spirits. 4v4 confrontation takes place between friends or random users. The main task of the hunters is to catch all the evil spirits with the help of their equipment, and the ghosts are to kill all living things by any means.

item.title: Momo and the Mine
item.description: Game Description Momo and the Mine sends a mole-protagonist to a dangerous, abandoned network of dungeons for collecting matches. The player will have to conduct a character through a series of difficult jumping tests, where accuracy is the key to survival. The gameplay requires accurate movement through the hostile surroundings filled with ghosts of tunnels. Success directly depends on mastering responsive controls to overcome each obstacle in the dilapidated structure of the mine, which creates a constant test of skill.

item.title: Horizon Forbidden West
item.description: Game Description Horizon Forbidden West – continuation of the adventures of the hunter Aloy, from the Nora tribe. In this part, the heroine finds herself on the coast of the former United States, where she will encounter new obstacles and deadly machines. You will have to use your bow and your ward’s abilities to confront your opponents and find out the secret of the islands. Watching Aloy from a third person, the user navigates the open world, completing main and side quests.

item.title: STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection brings back the beloved online shooters, remastered for modern consoles and PC. Players can now relive classic battles from the Star Wars galaxy, both online and offline, in this new collection. The collection includes the original game, as well as a bonus map: Jabba’s Palace. The second game, Battlefront 2, includes four bonus cards and two bonus heroes: Asajj Ventress and Kit Fisto.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description: Game Description Secrets of Grindea is an interesting adventure game in which you will need to take control of a hero and go on a long journey through a huge fantasy world in search of new adventures. The game begins with character generation. You will have to create it, change its appearance using an advanced editor, and then decide on the basic skills. After this, you can begin to explore the world around you.

item.title: Spiritfall
item.description: Game Description Spiritfall - an action -platformer with elements of a sling, which is based on the gameplay of which is a worked out combat system. It will be necessary to beat enemies, chop everything in their path and throw enemies into the wall. The gameplay is released by speed and concentrated dynamics. Opponents attack every second. At the end of the stage, a fight with a unique boss is waiting.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Last Epoch
item.description: Game Description Last Epoch is an action-adventure game with a deep leveling system in a dark style, gameplay repeating the legendary Diablo. The camera view is also taken from there, it is isometric for a better overview of the surrounding areas. The story campaign for one person (multiplayer is not provided) invites you to explore the rich world of Eterra, with various picturesque places and dark dungeons. It contains many different oddities, secrets, many demons and other fiends of hell.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal ofMyth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Fossilfuel 2
item.description: Game Description Fossilfuel 2 throws players into a flooded research center in Alaska, teeming with prehistoric predators. Jack Allen, a participant in the ill -fated expedition, must pave his way through dangerous puzzles, flooded tunnels and frightening darkness. Armed with the arsenal of deadly weapons, gamers pave their way through dinosaurs in terrible details on the Unreal Engine 5 engine. Equipment for underwater swimming becomes necessary when players plunge into underwater sections, confronts water threats along with their ground colleagues.

item.title: Nightingale
item.description: Game Description Nightingale takes you on a dangerous journey through the fantastical kingdoms of the fairies. As a Realmwalker, you’ll explore, craft, build, and fight across a variety of environments, alone or with friends. This open world survival game takes you through a labyrinth of beautiful but treacherous kingdoms. Stranded after the destruction of a network of portals, you must reach Nightingale, the last human bastion. Open portals and travel through wild forests, treacherous swamps and shimmering deserts.

item.title: Medieval Machines Builder
item.description: Game Description Medieval Machines Builder transfers players to the era of constant siege, where their innovative valor is their greatest weapon. As a novice ballistic engineer, you must develop a concept, collect resources and build the most powerful and destructive machines known in the Medieval War. The fate of many conquered castles will depend on the effectiveness of these devices. You start from scratch, but as your inventions come true and prove their effectiveness in battle, you get experience.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description InSmalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is not your average survival game, but a single-player, addictive auto-shooting game that is sure to keep you on your toes. As a lone dwarf, you’ll have to use every weapon in your arsenal to fight off waves of deadly aliens while earning riches and unlocking powerful upgrades. But don’t think this will be an easy task. You will have to face the harsh and unforgiving landscape of the planet Hoxes, and only your wits and weapons can protect you.

item.title: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost
item.description: Game Description Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost is a rhythm -game built on the foundation of his predecessor. Two different rhythm games have to be passed: traditional and innovative. In Kagura, players check their skills in repulsing the fingers of notes, sequentially hitting six paths. Combinations accumulate with each successful press, which leads to high points. This mode presents more than 160 popular arrangements at four levels of complexity, which will allow you to cope with the task of both beginners and experienced rhythm veterans.

item.title: Arms Trade Tycoon: Tanks
item.description: Game Description ARMS TRADE TYCOON: Tanks is a full -fledged simulation of the life of a magnate, managing the beginner company in trade and distribution of weapons. The company specializes in the creation and sale of tanks, on the technical characteristics of which the user will work. The game allows you to create unique engineering solutions by exploring new technologies and production methods. It is necessary to engage in the formation of the history of tank wars, where the created cars will be involved.

item.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League
item.description: Game Description Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is perfect for all fans of the DC universe who want to look at familiar heroes from a new angle. Now the roles have been changed, superheroes have become a danger to the local population, and a villainous squad led by the crazy Harley Quinn will have to save her. Loud explosions, massive destruction and mild madness reign in the city of Metropolis.

item.title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
item.description: Game Description Granblue Fantasy: Relink - an adventure in the vastness of the Heavenly Kingdom, where islands soar among the vast azure expanses. As the captain of a skyship, you’ll embark on a journey full of mystery, magic and camaraderie. Together with your faithful companions, such as the energetic dragon Virn and the mysterious Lyria, you will go to Estalucia - a mythical island shrouded in legends. You have to assemble a team of four people, which will include a variety of sky wanderers who own unique weapons and fighting styles.

item.title: Corsairs Legacy - Pirate Action RPG and Sea Battles
item.description: Game Description Corsaires Legacy - Pirate Action RPG and Sea Battles is a pirate adventure in the open world, which makes it possible to become a real corsar, exploring the seas and oceans, as well as fighting with numerous enemies both on land and at sea. Events develop on Barbados. Playing for an adventurer, it is required to become not only a thunderstorm of the seas, but also a whole tropical archipelago.

item.title: Project 13
item.description: Game Description Project 13 immerses players in the life of a probant, one person from many people stolen and enslaved by the structure, known as the group of project 13. deprived of the right to choose and is considered consumer material, the subject will be crossed by the corridor of a psychiatric hospital, which is constantly bocked. With the first -person view, the main task for subjects is the discovery of inconsistencies of the environment during their forced rounds.

item.title: Tekken 8
item.description: Game Description Tekken 8 is a continuation of the cult fighting game, directly continuing the story of the previous part. In the sequel, many beloved heroes return, and new fighters are introduced. A full-fledged story campaign is presented, telling the dramatic story of Jin Kazama’s family. In addition, you will find many different modes, including multiplayer battles, various tests, local co-op, the ability to customize fighters, etc. The gameplay of Tekken 8 is based on a complex combat system based on memorizing combinations and timings of opponents.

item.title: Underdogs
item.description: Game Description Underdogs - this is the Title in virtual reality, in which gamers fall into the very heart of the gloomy Cyberpanovsky world, where the fight of the furs reigns. The project does not hold back itself, pushing you with fierce enemies in cruel contractions. From the very first minutes, gamers plunge into the world of risk, where every step can mean the difference between life and death. Here you need to not just fight, but survive in conditions when the danger lurks around every angle.

item.title: Under Night In-Birth II Sys: Celes
item.description: Game Description Under Night In-Birth II Sys: Celes, the last part of the favorite fighting range, bursts on stage. This is not just a fresh layer of paint, it is a full -fledged evolution, promising a deeper and more dramatic experience of both veterans and beginners. Get ready to join the battle with 24 unique fighters, each of whom can boast of their own style of battle and a background. Three new fighters occupy a central place: Kaguya, elegant, but deadly dancer, owning two blades; Tsurugi, an unshakable wall of a warrior; And Kuon, a creature, challenging the borders of existence to the very borders.

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description: Game Description Anomaly Agent is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that places players in the heart of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. As the titular character, Anomaly, players take on the role of an agent on a mission to investigate and eliminate temporary anomalies wreaking havoc on the city. The narrative unfolds gradually, revealing a complex web of interconnected areas with their own unique challenges and mysteries. At the core of Anomaly Agent’s appeal is its innovative combat system, which relies on Anomaly’s unique ability to manipulate time.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: Snake Crush
item.description: Game Description Snake Crush begins after the death of a ghostly dragon, an event that breaks the passage between the world of people and the world of spirits, releasing the flow of power. A powerful influx of mystical energy and dark forces fills the metropolis, giving power to countless monsters and demons, who again carry destruction. The Bureau of Investigations, a special organization, is forced to intervene in this anomaly and sends its agents that are most resistant to unbridled energy.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: Stay
item.description: Game Description STAY tells of the maid motel Kes, plunging into the abyss of obsession and horror. The unknown is imbued with a dangerous sympathy for her and begins the affair campaign with letters. Correspondence becomes a threatening character, forcing the kes to enter into a dangerous game of survival against an invisible, but relentless threat. The narrative unfolds in the walls of its secluded workplace, creating a claustrophobic atmosphere for subsequent events, and the decisions made determine the finale.

item.title: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
item.description: Game Description Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout - an adventure action in which a group of people falls on a tropical island equipped with high -tech objects. The territory is governed by AI, which produces a huge number of combat robots and artificially nurtures of dinosaurs. The game is made in the Cyberpanus setting and contains elements of metroid. Once on the island, it must be examined by opening the results of a monstrous experiment.

item.title: World Warfare and Economics
item.description: Game Description World Warfare and Economics is a fascinating and large -scale strategy that offers to take control of any country on Earth, finding himself at the helm of world history. Having the opportunity to manage politics, economics and the armed forces of the country, players go through many trials, including the impending ghost of the Third World War, the inexorable procession of global pandemia and even scenarios created at their own discretion.

item.title: The enjenir
item.description: Game Description The Enjenir is a funny simulator based on physics in which players get used to the role of a clumsy Stone Age Engineer. This is a sandbox where you can build without restrictions and create unique structures using a wide selection of building materials and your own unique approach to design. In this game, you are not limited by standard construction methods - give the will to your imagination and create unusual, complex and functional constructions.

item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Riding
item.description: Game Description Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is an exciting 2.5D-fiting. Built on the foundation of its predecessor, this project retains emphasis on a rapid action and a component-controlled gameplay. The game has a variety of composition, which presents more than 20 characters from an extensive universe. Each character demonstrates its special set of movements and the battle style, offering players a number of strategic capabilities and game styles. The exciting plot regime of a single game unfolds in a richly worked out world, drawing inspiration in Japanese mythology and literature.

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is an isometric role -playing game made based on the cult universe of a fighting hammer. In her setting, the Grimard is mixed with science fiction. This product offers to travel through space on a huge ship, visit different places, chat with colorful non -pains, pump, perform quests, participate in battles. All the battles here are step -by -step and tactical. They are divided into 2 types.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.description: Game Description Disney Dreamlight Valley is a life simulator with adventure elements. Title is designed for fans and fans of Disney cartoons. He is replete with references and fanservice. Moreover, Walt Disney is not limited to the brainchild of Walt. The project can also please the fans of the Pixar studio. The character editor allows you to create a hero or heroine and go on a trip. Your protagonist can be customized.

item.title: Svarog's Dream
item.description: Game Description Svarog’s Dream stands out as a fascinating RPG that immerses the intriguing depths of the underground world. Appearing as a soul looking for themselves, players travel around a huge open world, solving personal secrets and moving through the constantly changing landscapes that determine this mysterious kingdom. A diverse environment varies from lush forests to towering mountains, desert plains and noisy cities. Each location is unique trials and awards, prompting the players to go in search and reveal secrets hidden in every corner.

item.title: Below The Stone
item.description: Game Description Below The Stone is an exciting indie game that immerses in the depths of the mysterious kingdom. Taking the role of a brave gnome, the user will go to insidious searches for rare resources, reveal ancient secrets and create formidable equipment. However, it is worthwhile to beware of dangers that are in wait for as an adventurer descends further into the abyss. Covering more than 25 different biomes that differ in visual and design, the project offers a variety of enemies, treasures and dangers in each area.

item.title: Astral ascent
item.description: Game Description Astral Ascent transfers gamers to the modern phenetesic world, where everything looks completely different from in reality. Here, the main characters were imprisoned in an astral prison called the garden. At first glance, it seems that cute lawns and paths do not conceal anything dangerous in themselves, but in reality this is not so. There are 12 strong bosses called zodiacs as guards. Moreover, at every step there will be small enemies that can deliver a lot of trouble.

item.title: Cuisineer
item.description: Game Description Cuisineer is a delightful mix of dungeon crawling, cooking, and restaurant management that takes you into the captivating story of Pom, an energetic adventurer who must save her family’s diner in Paella. Armed with her culinary skills, she travels beyond her hometown, engaging in culinary battles with monsters and collecting ingredients to prepare delicious dishes for her visitors. Offering a variety of culinary adventures with an extensive repertoire of over 100 recipes spanning the globe, from savory Popiah rolls to sweet Kaya jam and crispy chicken delicacies.

item.title: Lost Hope: Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Lost Hope: BackRooms offers a single first -person adventure in the alarming locations of backstage. Key classes include navigation for these confusing, interconnected places and active interaction with the environment for solving logical puzzles, which contributes to the development of the main plot. The area often demonstrates strange and inexplicable phenomena, which are difficult to immediately comprehend. Gamers have to carefully study these elements in order to reveal the secrets hidden in this tense journey.

item.title: SANABI
item.description: Game Description SANABI is a pixel action game with retro style and unique locations. The game takes place in the distant future, where cybernetic prosthetics have become the norm, even if the person has not lost a limb. After all, they can be equipped with various useful technical devices and overcome human abilities. But it has also become a convenient opportunity for criminals to gain easy access to sophisticated weapons.

item.title: Achilles: Legends Untold
item.description: Game Description In Achilles: Legends Untold, users are included in the image of the famous mythological character, which goes to the next fateful adventure. This time, Achilles is in the center of the conflict between Aid and Ares. Its main goal is to defeat phobos - the child of the god of war. But this does not mean that he himself will come and offer to converge in the battle. To find it, you will have to go a long way, faced with the most dangerous and vile creatures that have ever existed on Earth.

item.title: Magicraft
item.description: Game Description Magicraft throws you into a world overrun by ancient gods. As a lone hero, you wield a legendary staff - your only hope for salvation. This roguelike focuses on spells that can be combined to create devastating effects. The developers themselves admit that the number of possibilities exceeds their own imagination! The game world is strange and whimsical, filled with unusual creatures and riddled with a ridiculous plot. Magicraft doesn’t take itself too seriously, but rather offers a light-hearted adventure with an emphasis on fun and flashy combat.

item.title: Visco Collection
item.description: Game Description Visco Collection presents 7 arcade titles from the 1980s and 1990s. This collection contains projects of several genres, including Shoot ‘Em Up, fighting, sports and racing. The presented software supports single and local multiplayer modes for competitive or joint passage. Each Title demonstrates the special style of the arcade gameplay of that time with unique goals and mechanics that players have to study. The Visco Collection contains Andro Dunos-Side-Squash Shoot ‘Em Up, which encounters you with elaboration ships and large-scale bosses.

item.title: Farmer's Life
item.description: Game Description The main character Farmer’s Life was Kashmir - a middle -aged bachelor living in the outback of Eastern Europe. It contains a small farm and is often applied to the bottle. The realism of what is happening does not end there. The character of the character is affected by the change of seasons and wild animals. Help Kashmir cultivate the land and survive in a harsh environment. Perform the hero’s natural needs, making sure that he is always fed, filled and laid to sleep.

item.title: Out of Orbit
item.description: Game Description Out of Orbit offers space experience, focused on the liberty of the player in accidentally created universes. Gamers design, build and command their own starships, or can attack, disassemble or capture the vessels of others. People base planetary bases to expand the influence and extraction of materials. The actions of the gamer affect the game world and have long -term consequences. Any ship met can be taken on boarding and destroyed.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: Empty Shell
item.description: Game Description Empty Shell will send you to the very heart of a dark and dangerous industrial environment at a secret facility on the Japanese island. You have to perform a “recovery operation”, which you know a little about, but this is only the beginning. You will find yourself at an object that was abandoned for decades, but something is wrong in it. Solve dark secrets, dig in the documents and magazines of the 1950s and find out the stories of the people who worked there.

item.title: Nuclear Option
item.description: Game Description In the game** Nuclear Option** you will find yourself in the cabin of modern combat aircraft on the battlefield of the near future, where the roar of engines and the crackling of tracers draw a bright picture of air battles. Each plane, from agile fighters to bulky bombers, is asked in hands, and its cabin pulsates with vital information while you scan targets and evade fire. The world unfolds under you - a dynamic tapestry of vast landscapes, raging seas and bristling enemy objects.

item.title: Lords of the Fallen
item.description: Game Description Lords of the Fallen invites gamers to the gloomy world of Fantasy, where you will become one of the legendary dark crusaders and will fight against the Demon of Adira. Lords of the Fallen is an epic adventure in a vast territory, which is five times more than the world of the original game. Adir tormented the country for many centuries, and now it needs to be overthrown again.

item.title: Subpar Pool
item.description: Game Description Subpar Pool combines golf and billiard elements on a table of tables. The player will have to remove all balls for a limited number of blows at each procedured level, consisting of a sequence of connected surfaces. Gameplay based on physics requires strategic planning to roll objects. Classing and scattering balls often require adjusting the original plans, forcing to adapt the next move to complete the stage. As you pass, gamers build a course, choosing cards from the deck to change experience.

item.title: The Front
item.description: Game Description In The Front, your task, as a resistance fighter, boils down to go into the past in order to prevent the formation of a tyrannical empire that threatens the very existence of mankind. The game is a craft shooter with an open world, immersing a player in a post -apocalyptic sandbox, teeming with mutants and hostile groups. In this terrain destroyed by the war, you have to fight with tyrannical imperial forces, exiles, bandits and rebels in an epic battle, which will determine the future of mankind.

item.title: EA SPORTS FC 24
item.description: Game Description EA SPORTS FC 24 is designed to revolutionize virtual football. With an impressive roster of over 19,000 licensed athletes, over 30 leagues, and recreations of over 100 iconic stadiums, it’s a fan’s dream. At the heart of FIFA 24 is HyperMotion V, a revolutionary technology that uses volumetric data collected from cameras strategically placed around stadiums during more than 180 top-tier matches. Thanks to this technology, an unreal level of realism is achieved.

item.title: Saleblazers
item.description: Game Description Saleblazers offers to enjoy the exciting experience of survival in the multiplayer action, in which you have to create a store and survive in a dangerous world filled with various dangers. On this dangerous island you will have to build cozy cafes or huge shopping centers in the company with other players. The whole world of the game is a reactive sandbox, where each buyer has his own character, tastes and preferences.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: El Paso, Elsewhere
item.description: Game Description El Paso, Elsewhere immerses players in dynamic shootings with werewolves, vampires and other evil spirits that make his way to the surface of the planet. Events transfer to the territory of a small Texas settlement under the name El Passes, where he will have to fight terrible opponents. The main character finds himself in a small three -story hotel hiding the secret deep underground. Players will have to go down to dark basements to go through 46 combat missions and destroy hellish creatures.

item.title: Railgunners
item.description: Game Description Railgunners puts players in the script of a rail shooter, where humanity is fighting an alien invasion. This title represents battles through customizable complexity parameters, allowing gamers to regulate the intensity of contractions. Gamers move in a two -dimensional perspective with lateral scrolling, faced with hundreds of enemy units in numerous conflict zones. The main task includes a breakthrough through the vast lines of the enemy in order to get to the mother vessel of the aliens and begin its destruction.

item.title: Payday 3
item.description: Game Description Payday 3 - The second continuation of the original multiplayer game dedicated to the life of robbers and their sorties to dangerous crimes for making money and respect in gang circles, an analogue of levels from other projects. By increasing authority, new types of weapons and customization items will be unlocked, allowing you to create a unique appearance of the protagonist. This part of the franchise uses the Unreal Engine 4 engine.

item.title: Lies of p
item.description: Game Description Lies of P was inspired by the famous story about Pinocchio, but demonstrates a more cruel and gloomy version of the fairy tale. To become a person, kindness and love are not enough, because the human essence also has bloodthirsty features, where everyone is ready to fight for power or place under the sun by any means. Much has to be built on lies, the main thing is not to get confused in it so that the protagonist is not declassified.

item.title: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
item.description: Game Description The BackRooms: Last Expedition is a cooperative in the horror genre, in which from 1 to 4 gamers are united in teams to survive in an alarming world. The main attention is paid to the passage of a series of dangerous, constantly changing levels, each of which is filled with mysterious creatures. Together, players should try to escape from the horror surrounding them, using their collective forces to resist the unknown.

item.title: Starfield
item.description: Game Description Starfield opens a new chapter in the gaming universe after a quarter-century hiatus. Bethesda, known for such outstanding projects as The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4, offers an expansive next-generation role-playing game set in outer space. In 2330, humanity expands far beyond the boundaries of our solar system: pioneers colonize distant planets, turning into a space-faring civilization. Join the ranks of Constellation, a group of intrepid space explorers on a quest to find elusive artifacts scattered across the galaxy in Bethesda’s most ambitious endeavor to date.

item.title: Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder
item.description: Game Description Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder tells about the journey of a young orc named Madren after his ship crashes off the coast of the Thunder Island. There he finds an artifact, melting in himself significant power, which forces him to go through a series of trials to disclose all the capabilities of the find. The island is the main game location for a study filled with its population and secrets.

item.title: Pocket Bravey
item.description: Game Description Pocket Bravey is a dynamic fighting game that acquaints charismatic characters with a unique battle style and abilities. The gameplay is inspired by the classic fatings of the 90s, but containing a number of modern mechanics and functions. The visual style is represented by retro design. The environment is made in bright colors that refer to various Japanese projects. The heroes of Pocket Bravey are represented by several types of shocks, combinations, block and supervision.

item.title: Bee Island
item.description: Game Description In Bee Island, you will become the head of a prosperous hive, taking on the role of a defender from impending threats. The main attention in the game is paid to defense and strategic construction. Enemies make sporadic attacks, and your task is to protect the hive. They are armed with bombs, poisonous aerosols and missiles, their strength is constantly growing. To reflect their attack, you have to build a whole complex of protective structures - ballists, machine guns, anti -aircraft missile systems and much more.

item.title: Orbo's Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Orbo’s Odyssey offers to become in place of the eccentric Orbo of Stetson, an ordinary personal assistant with unusual abilities. This 3D platformer will send you on a surreal journey through the office of your boss, where running, jumping and drilling is just an iceberg top. A project with notes of comedy and oddities promises a unique experience. Adventures begin with the fact that Orbo and his colleague Pibe are locked in the office of his boss due to a malfunction of the door to open the door.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: Labyrinthine
item.description: Game Description Labyrinthine is a first-person horror game that you can play alone or with friends. You find yourself in the mysterious labyrinths of a mysterious mansion on the outskirts of the forest. Try to find a way to escape from these cursed lands. Collect useful items, solve puzzles and run away from bloodthirsty monsters that are always on your heels. The main goal is to survive! Team up in co-op and play with up to three players as you try to unravel the mysteries of this cursed forest and find a way out of the mystical Heppiesburgh Hedge.

item.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 is a fascinating and realistic first -person construction simulator. If you are ready to pick up a cutter and a hammer again, then it’s time to go to the new coast with the largest cemetery of ships in the world and start dismantling huge details of ships. In this continuation, you will find new, even larger vessels, new gaming mechanics, functions and improvements, as well as improved mechanics that you loved in the first part.

item.title: Eon Fighter
item.description: Game Description Eon Fighter is an action game with a top view with Roguelite systems where the player pilots the fighter through the hostile sectors of the cosmos. The gameplay is focused on a collision with continuous waves of opponents and collecting resources for promotion. In the role of the last representative of mankind, it is necessary to carry out tasks, confronts the constant enemy. The structure of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre requires continuous movement and tactical ingenuity to survive in the conditions of the onslaught.

item.title: Standbox
item.description: Game Description Standbox, a bizarre single -user physical sandbox, invites players to indulge their children’s impulses to expand borders and experiments. Imagine a virtual world in which the central place is occupied by an elastic doll, which, on your order, passes all kinds of tests and hardships. In this interactive digital site, you can interact with ragongollah in a variety of ways. It doesn’t matter what you choose - to lightly push it or throw out your most daring whims on it - you can observe the reaction and stability of Ragdollah.

item.title: Gorebox
item.description: Game Description Gorebox is an exciting sandbox that allows you to reveal its creative potential and create a world full of tense moments on the basis of physics. Various types of weapons and explosives are offered a choice, as well as a special device called Reality Crusher, which makes it possible to interact with surrounding objects. In addition, you can configure your character using skins and accessories, as well as create or explore user cards through the built -in editor and workshop.

item.title: Δv: rings of saturn
item.description: Game Description Rings of Saturn is a two -dimensional cosmoster, whose events are transferred to the distant future of 2273. Humanity began to extract important resources on the rings of Saturn. This event began to be called the golden fever of the new century. You control the ship that is engaged in the prey of fossils in the open spaces of the open space. Your main goal was only one - to get rich.

item.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
item.description: Game Description My Friendly Neighborhood immerses users for the role of a simple repairman Gordon, which is forced to cope with gloomy and revived puppets attacking the hero during the play “Our friendly neighborhood.” The protagonist is forced to survive and cope with various puzzles to find a way out of the trap. The MFN game is an action horror where you have to cope with dynamic levels, using a variety of weapons for self -defense.

item.title: Brick Rigs
item.description: Game Description Brick Rigs is a sandbox that allows you to create a variety of vehicles, and then enjoy realistic driving and destruction physics. You need to build cars using various blocks. The Brick Rings toolkit allows you to create a dragster, a fire truck, a forklift, a helicopter, an airplane or even a tank - it all depends on your imagination and skill. Gameplay Brick Rigs is a full-fledged construction set with which you can create any type of transport.

item.title: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Zombie Survivors is an action roginal for those who are ready to fight with the horde of undead! Humanity can be on the verge of extinction, but this does not mean that you will fall without a fight. This is not a typical game with long scenes and complex management - here you need to immediately join the battle and see how sparks fly! Regardless of what your level of game experience you have, you will enjoy this game.

item.title: Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners 1
item.description: Game Description Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners #1 occurs in the Nazi concentration camp, where the main characters are prisoners who are going to execute for participation in the conspiracy of the rebels. However, they soon find out that death is not the worst thing that can happen to them, because they will find an even more terrible fate. They must find a way to escape from the nightmare that awaits them in the camp.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Choo Choo Survivor
item.description: Game Description Choo Choo Survivor is an exciting adventure in the world, teeming with a zombie, where you have to take the train and break through the endless waves of undead.
