item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance is a plot branch from the original universe of the recognized genius Hideo Kojima. The game is in the slasher genre, unlike other Metal Gear projects. The plot is dedicated to the story of the cyber ninja Raiden, the protagonist of the second part. 4 years have passed since the collapse of the evil Sons of Patriots corporation. The military units, given freedom of action, plunged the world into chaos and constant divisions of power zones.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: The Game. Season 2 – the continuation of the “Walking Dead” franchise does not lag behind the first part and begins its story 2 years after the previous events. Now in The Walking Dead: Season Two, the user plays as a 10-year-old girl, Clementine, who is once again trying to find shelter and survive in a mortal world filled with living corpses. Having lost all his old friends, a brave child begins a journey on his own.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion - a fascinating zombie at the first person, created in the best traditions of action with a completely open world. The plot tells us about the world into which the virus penetrates and absorbs everyone without a trace. Everyone who fell under his actions turned into half -dead carcasses that crave blood. We take the role of the character, for the large -scale cleansing of human lands from the zombie.

item.title: The Wolf Among Us
item.description: Game Description The Wolf Among Us is an episodic graphic novel based on the Fable comics series created by Bill Willingham. The game’s plot acts as a prequel to the main story. The game is divided into 5 episodes, where every decision made by the player has a consequence and affects the overall one. history. The gameplay is point-and-click, but some sections contain action and fights, which are QTE scenes. All the characters presented in the game are heroes of famous fairy tales, who, with the help of spells, can exist in the world of people or “Simps”, as they are called here.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description InArma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific. More than 400 square kilometers of gaming space, where the player, playing the role of a NATO peacekeeper, will save his group from real traitors who show themselves at the beginning of the story campaign.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description InTotal War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description The events ofCompany of Heroes 2 unfold before us in snowy Norilsk, where one of the largest Stalinist Gulags is located. NKVD officer Churkin comes here, who understands that he will not survive the next Stalinist purge of officers. In the Gulag he finds his comrade from the front, who is serving his sentence and preparing to be shot. Isakovich is the name of the character, he wrote a tome with the real actions of the commanders of the Red Army, for which he was sentenced to death.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter -Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Batman: Arkham City
item.description: Game Description Batman: Arkham City is an action-adventure game with a third-person view, based on one of the most popular heroes of comics, cartoons, films and toys, Batman. This project is an expanded edition of the original game. The media product was developed by Rocksteady Studios. The official release took place in early autumn 2012. The game world is five times larger in area than in the previous Batman: Arkham Asylum.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season One
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: Season One is an interactive story divided into 6 episodes with elements of a point-n-click adventure and with QTEs in action scenes, telling the story of Lee Everett, a prisoner who was being transported in a police station when the zombie apocalypse began. car to another place of serving his sentence, but due to an attack on the vehicle by the dead, he managed to escape.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the gameSaints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is rightfully considered a legendary game. Even now, many years after its release, it continues to conquer new users who come to it based on recommendations or out of their own interest. In the role of a warrior named Dovahkiin, the gamer will find himself in a huge world full of mysteries, unexpected turns and battles. Here it is not possible to follow the path of a straightforward passage.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires
item.description: Game Description Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires begins when strange divine perfumes begin to come from people, Yokaev and fairies. In response to this event, female protagonists of the game go to the other world, suggesting that it is the key to unraveling the phenomenon. The gameplay offers to lead the chosen heroine through a series of levels filled with flitches of shells from opponents. The task is to survive these attacks and destroy the entire opposition, completing the passage of the stage with the boss.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings
item.description: Game Description The computer game “The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings” is an expanded limited edition of the impressive continuation of the 2008 giant of the world of role-playing video games “The Witcher”. The development of this project was carried out by the famous studio CD PROJEKT RED. The announcement came in May 2011. Geralt of Rivia is the greatest of the line of witchers, wielding a sword better than others, almost the only one who can resist the forces of darkness, while being something between an ordinary person and a monster.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person puzzle gamePortal 2 received an official announcement only in the spring of 2011, after several postponements. This project is a direct continuation of the original part, which received the highest reviews from critics and gamers around the world. The game was developed by the legendary company Valve, which needs no introduction. The game’s plot continues the line begun in the first part of the “Portal” series. A girl named Chell defeated a powerful artificial intelligence that went out of control and destroyed the entire staff of the Aperture Science research complex.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum Game of the Year Edition
item.description: Game Description InBatman: Arkham Asylum the protagonist will still have to fight the Scarecrow, capture territories that belonged to the Joker or other villains, and in return we will be treated to 4 new maps: Crime Alley, Scarecrow’s Nightmare, Night Stalker and Complete Madness. The founder of the legendary series, Batman: Arkham Asylum is a stealth action game with a third-person view and an open world. In the role of the Dark Knight of Gotham, the gamer can freely explore the Arkham psychiatric hospital and the island on which it is located, fight enemies using a convenient and spectacular combat system, and an arsenal of all kinds of gadgets.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description InLeft 4 Dead 2 we have a choice between 4 characters. The coach is a massive African American; Nick is an avid gambler, a trickster and a master of theft; Rochelle is a black 29-year-old Depeche Mode fan and journalist; Ellis is a racing fan and car enthusiast. The cooperative first-person shooter captivated many players for several years, providing ample ground for exterminating zombies in 5 game campaigns, which take place in swamps, cities, caves and closed locations.

item.title: LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga
item.description: Game Description LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga is the legendary LEGO game based on the Star Wars universe. The player is given a unique opportunity to become a participant in the events of his favorite film epic, feel all the experiences of the heroes and choose the Dark or Light Side. All LEGO games have cartoon graphics, which is beneficial and creates the right atmosphere. The gameplay cannot be called varied, but it does not get boring.

item.title: Touhou Searensen ~ undefined fantastic object
item.description: Game Description Touhou Searensen ~ Undefined Fantastic Object is a scroll-player in which the player controls the human character and uses shells to win the antagonists. Any contact with enemy bullets, lasers or opponents themselves leads to a loss of life. When the player’s reserve runs out, the game ends. All items on the screen are collected when moving the controlled character to the upper boundary of the location. Activation of the function of the slow movement attracts the nearest objects directly to the protagonist, helping in their collection during the battle.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part ofLeft 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
item.description: Game Description The open world of the newly releasedHalf-Life 2: Episode Two at one time created a stir all over the world. Openly moving with one goal - to deliver information about the Alliance to the Resistance base - was a shocking task that players rushed into one after another. In the first-person shooter, we will continue to play as Gordon Freeman with Alixa Vance. Long journeys in the game are accompanied by frequent changes of scenes: now we are fighting against mutants, now we are solving puzzles, now we are watching an interactive film about the characters’ journey and their conversations.

item.title: Portal
item.description: Game Description Portal is a first-person adventure puzzle game. The plot takes place in the Aperture scientific laboratory, into which the main character, Chell, ended up. She is the one who must test a new weapon that allows you to create portals. Throughout the entire passage, the heroine will be pursued by the GLaDOS robot, telling her what to do and where to go. The first levels will be educational, they will tell you how to use the device.

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.description: Game Description Garry’s Mod is a game and physics sandbox. The main game mode is aimless and provides the player with a freely customizable world powered by the Source engine. The player creates non-player characters with various interaction objects. Special tools and tools allow you to construct new objects in reality, fix beams, iron, objects. Changing facial expressions is also available. Thanks to the flexible engine, users create their own modifications: Spacebuild, Wiremod, Elevator: Source, DarkRP, Prop Hunt and others.

item.title: STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack is a collection of real-time strategies based on the Star Wars plot. You will play the role of an army manager on one of the sides in an intergalactic civil war. Command units of the Empire, Rebels, Republic or other civilizations. In Star Wars Empire at War, you will command your team, completing tasks and freeing planets from enemies. Visit Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Dagobah or other hot spots in the galaxy.

item.title: Serious Sam 2
item.description: Game Description The entire Serious Sam 2 - a first-person shooter with a lot of action - shows us the atmosphere of an absurd fight with many monsters, weapons and a huge number of bonuses scattered on each planet. Cool Sam is full of hope to kill Mental. Everyone in the universe knows that the antagonist is immortal, and in order to destroy him, make him vulnerable, you will have to collect the Medallion of Power.

item.title: Half-Life 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter, which instantly became the voice of the generation -Half-Life 2 - gave players hope for the third part. The game has received so many awards that there is no point in describing them in the context of the description. The plot reveals to us the continuation of the first part. Gordon Freeman takes up his mount again, but now the graphics have become more realistic, there are more locations, and the plot is even deeper.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment,Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: POSTAL 2
item.description: Game Description POSTAL 2 is a first-person shooter full of dark humor, references, blood and other hardcore stuff like desecrating graves or putting cats on a machine gun as a silencer. The plot develops in a strange town - Paradise. The main character of Postal 2 will be a character named Dude. He tries to live an ordinary life without doing anything illegal. At the beginning of the story, he gets a job at the computer game development office Running with Scissors.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition
item.description: Game Description Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition is a stealth action game that tells about the world of 2052, when corporations have completely seized power over society, and augmentations have become an integral part of human life. The world is experiencing an economic crisis, various terrorist organizations have become active, and people are suffering from a pandemic - the Gray Death. The main character of the game is special agent JC Denton, who must deal with all this chaos, coming face to face with the Illuminati, conspiracy theories and the secrets of Area 51.

item.title: Half-Life (1998)
item.description: Game Description Half-Life (1998) - sci-fi shooter. One of the first games where the plot was completely presented using cutscenes in the engine. One of the main features of Half-Life was the artificial intelligence of enemies, which was striking in its elaboration. The story of Half-Life begins at the Black Mesa research facility in the mountains of New Mexico. Control takes place for the young physicist Gordon Freeman, who is researching anomalous materials.

item.title: Ardenfall
item.description: Game Description Ardenfall - a role -playing role, plunging wanderers into the world of ancient cultures, secret magic and political intrigues on the mysterious island of Ardenfall. The hero’s path runs through a variety of lands: from windy plains and rain flooded to long abandoned ruins and winding caves, lurking both treasures and deadly dangers. In this world, each solution has weight, affecting the economy of the regions and the attitude of local residents towards you.

item.title: Bittersweet Birthday
item.description: Game Description The protagonistBittersweet Birthday wakes up in an unknown place without memories and representing how it turned out to be here. He begins to ask standard questions how he found himself here and what to do next. However, a strange voice appears in silence, saying: “Hello, buddy.” The passage is tied to listen to the voice, as this is the only salvation. The central character is persecuted by unstable people, constantly threatening him with reprisals or injuries.

item.title: Blades of Fire
item.description: Game Description Blades of Fire offers to gamers to take on the role of Aran de Lira, who begins his way to find a true purpose. The Queen of Nereya turned steel into stone throughout the kingdom with her witchcraft. Only her army, consisting of abominations and undead, has a divine metal that can effectively resist any other armament. This mission leads Aran and his ADSO companion through the vast world, filled with dangers, deep secrets and various locations, such as huge castles and labyrinths of palaces.

item.title: Dreamed Away
item.description: Game Description Dreamed Away causes a feeling of foggy nostalgia, a journey along the path of memories that takes an unexpected turn. The bizarre charm of the France of the 1990s collapses around the edges, opening the world at the same time alarming and strangely alluring. Theo, our main character, is drawn into this fairy -tale world. K conmitted bridges turn into impossible figures, familiar houses turn into grotesque carications on themselves.

item.title: Machine Mind
item.description: Game Description Machine Mind places the player in the role of consciousness transferred to a mechanical shell after the crash of a spaceship. The existence of a gamer is limited by the world, a changed planetary virus and subsequent nuclear conflict - the cataclysm, which forced the remnants of civilization to hide at the orbital station. Managing a series of rovers, it is necessary to provide its survival on the surface of the planet, now inhabited by aggressive raiders.

item.title: MilitSioner
item.description: Game Description Militsioner is a surreal game in which the player will need to prove his innocence. He is accused of committing a crime that he never did, but is it so easy to convince a policeman who rarely changes his point of view and, in his opinion, has a clear moral compass. In addition, he has a rather tough Soviet mentality that will break through even more difficult. Perhaps the escape will be the only decision.

item.title: Mother Hub
item.description: Game Description Mother Hub - this is not a typical shooter. This game throws you headlong into a hopeless situation - humanity on the edge of the abyss, and only you keep the reins of government. Each of your solution, each path you have chosen can become the difference between survival and oblivion. Fasten, because here the choice has consequences. Here it is not just that you need to press the trigger.

item.title: Coven
item.description: Game Description Going to the gloomy world ofCoven, you have to deal with a large number of enemy creatures and deal with their elimination. The universe takes you into an atmospheric medieval fantasy world, where witches and other mythical creatures live alongside people. The first episode is available in the game, where you will take on the role of a young girl. The heroine is burned at the stake during the 1600s, mistaken for a witch and a fiend.

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero
item.description: Game Description Zenless Zone Zero is a role -playing game whose action takes place in a world standing on the edge of the abyss, where players take on the role of proxy, a conductor according to alternative dimensions, known as hollows. Players choose one of the two main characters, the wise or Belle, each of which leads the expedition to these dangerous areas. Target? Fight with creatures called Eterials, and go through various tests in these dimensions.

item.title: Instinct
item.description: Game Description The shooterInstinct tells an alternative story of the events that took place in the Yangangdo Mountains, which took place in reality on September 13, 2004. The developers had their own version, which they used as the basis for the game. A strange explosion occurs in a North Korean province called Yangangdo. Terrible experiments were carried out in secret laboratories located near a huge mountain. During the research, scientists tested an alien virus called Instinct.

item.title: Neuro
item.description: Game Description Neuro is a three-dimensional action game that gives the player the feeling of being inside a fictional world in the role of a psionicist who can use his abilities for combat purposes. The story told in this brainchild of the developers “Revolt Games” is a prequel to their other project called “Homeplanet”. The last missions of the single-player campaign develop in parallel with the start of their last game.

item.title: Atomic OWL
item.description: Game Description Atomic OWL puts the player in the role of Idalgo Bladywing, a bird who went to save his comrades. The main conflict is tied to the confrontation with the sorcerer-Voron Omega Vinc, who by force subjugated his entire troupe. The plot starts 2 years after this incident that happened during the return of the detachment to Ramennaya. Idalgo begins a campaign to correct the deed, and a daring speaking blade helps him in this.

item.title: BattleBlock Theater
item.description: Game Description BattleBlock Theater is a platformer with cartoon graphics and a side view. It has a simple plot, because it is far from the main one in this genre. The player takes on the role of a prisoner who goes through various levels of the theater with one goal - to save Hatty Hattington. The gameplay is not complicated at first glance: level progression is linear, jumps are simple and standard for the genre, and there are a couple of types of enemy attacks.

item.title: Clockwork Ambrosia
item.description: Game Description Clockwork Ambrosia Submits you into the world of secrets and chaos. Take control of Iris, a fearless engineer, and go to the shadow depths of the distant island. The research colony has discovered ambrosia - a substance that can rewrite the rules of invention. But something went wrong. Now silence hung in the air. Iris will have to navigate this interconnected world, fighting with monstrous creations and mechanized monsters.

item.title: Deus Ex Revision
item.description: Game Description Deus Ex Revision is a global modification for the original part of Deus Ex. The addon includes new locations and additional music. Improved character models and environments. Added alternate modes and various bonus content. The gameplay and plot remained unchanged. As in the original game, the main character of Deus Ex Revision is an agent named J.C. Denton. The events take place in the world of the future in 2052.

item.title: Dracomaton
item.description: Game Description Dracomaton begins with the awakening of a small robot named Eklips at an abandoned factory inhabited by faulty training bots and storing secrets about space dragons. The main task of the player is to climb the tower, overcoming locations with a view of the top, filled with bumpy fire of hostile mechanisms. The key aspect of survival is the ability to transform the physical shell of the robot, allowing to instantly change its entire combat arsenal.

item.title: Echolocaution
item.description: Game Description Echolocaution immerses in the night world, in which gamers are guided by sound. A small bat is given under control, whose main occupation is a hunt for insects from sunset to dawn. The key gameplay mechanics are tied to the emission of ultrasound waves covering the dark environment. Such echolocation reveals both sources of food and hidden threats. The task of each race is to absorb as much production as possible before the morning, relying on the ear to search for food and avoid dangers.

item.title: From the Depths
item.description: Game Description From the Depths allows you to accept command of battleships, aircraft, submarines, space ships, balloons and many other modes of transport. The story campaign will visit more than a hundred lands and fight against 8 fractions. Misses consist in planning competent tactics and protecting your own fleet in a series of difficult tests. In addition to the main campaign, there is an adventure mode where it will be proposed to start the game alone on a small ship and grow to a whole fleet, furrows the expanses of the universe.

item.title: Genshin Impact
item.description: Game Description Genshin Impact is an alloy of action and role -playing play from a third -person view. The Chinese project using anime style has an open world. Title is primarily designed for solitary passage, although it has the opportunity to run in a cooperative. There is no PVP mode in a local multiplayer. At the very beginning of the game, they allow you to choose the main character - brother or sister.

item.title: Good Heavens!
item.description: Game Description Good HEAVENS! It takes place in the Severe Kingdom of Xant-Rar, a bizarre afterlife, where souls live on floating islands. This songwriter with the open world allows gamers to pave their own path in the world, crowded with bizarre capabilities. Imagine: you have lived a good life, have left the earthly path and got into Xant -Rar - a place intended for the fulfillment of all your desires throughout eternity.

item.title: Haste: Broken Worlds
item.description: Game Description Haste: Broken Worlds presents the world with a rapid action from a third person, the action of which unfolds in a setting, which is on the verge of collapse. The user will have to take on the role of Zoe, which rushes along the procedurally generated levels, trying to escape from the decay of the world surrounding it. Each of the ten fragments is a series of levels that need to be passed in a certain order, and each time the journey unfolds differently, due to the accident of procedural generation.

item.title: Heli-Cats
item.description: Game Description Heli-Cats puts players in a world experiencing an energy and economic crisis. Against the background of this instability, the rebellious forces begin a coordinated attack on the Alliance. The combined security alliance uses a special helicopter unit acting under the guise of a local militarized formation. Pilots Tiger and Lynx fulfill the mission to repel the invaders and clarify the causes of the conflict. Their operations are planned so that they can renounce them in case of failure, conducting gamers through 8 arcade stages and 2 more available under special conditions.

item.title: Ikarus Parkour
item.description: Game Description Ikarus Parkor is transferred to the role of a contestant in a television competition arranged for the entertainment of a chosen group. The contestants voluntarily join this event, after which they are transported to a secret underground place for the test. The goal is to climb the massive 850-meter vertical structure from its base to the top. Successful overcoming the obstacles of the tower means obtaining a monetary prize and personal freedom, which is awarded to the finish.

item.title: Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony
item.description: Game Description Kalpa: Cosmic Symphony - a rhythm game for five keys. Users will breathe life into a dying universe, playing music. This is a space trip to save Iggdrasil. Rhythmic patterns go beyond the standard gameplay. A beginner or professional, Adventure checks the skills. Original music belongs to Morimori Atsushi, Ice, Team Grimoire and Hyun. The project also refers to the classic of the rhythm Halcyon, Sound Chimera, The Last Page, äventyr and L2 -reminisceence-.

item.title: Market Garden
item.description: Game Description Market Garden is a one-user first-person shooter whose action takes place during the airborne operation of the Second World War. The project offers a linear campaign conducting a gamer through historical clashes with an emphasis on infantry battles. In Title, there are intentionally absent elements as open worlds, microtransactions and cosmetic skins. Battles contain blood scenes and violence, demonstrating deaths on the battlefield. Such a gaming design is completely concentrated on key mechanics of shooting and the development of a single narrative.

item.title: Mr. Nomad
item.description: Game Description Mr. Nomad immerses in a world, where survival depends on the only camp, serving as a mobile refuge. The main task is to build a fortified base around this van to reflect constant raids of the horde of zombies. The basis of gameplay is a two -level construction system that allows you to place ground fortifications and at the same time dig a safe bunker under them. This underground space serves as a protected area for growing a crop and storing valuable supplies far from external threats.

item.title: No Such Place
item.description: Game Description No Such Place is a tactical shooter in which agents of the Unknown Research Consortium (U.R.C.) organization are tasked with carrying out dangerous forays into anomalous zones. Operatives must penetrate unstable regions known as Dimensional Fragments, where the laws of physics and time gradually collapse. The main task becomes not only the destruction of supernatural threats, but also the collection of valuable information and resources before the area is completely erased from reality.

item.title: Operator
item.description: Game Description Operator is an exciting game where you become a secret operative performing dangerous tasks around the world. A realistic experience of tactical battle awaits you, where your every decision matters. The game contains a unique system of physical interaction, which allows you to manipulate objects and weapons naturally. This adds a feeling of presence and realism, without the need to use VR-Schles. A special emphasis in the operator is placed on a multi -user cooperative regime.

item.title: Refind Self: The Personality Test Game
item.description: Game Description Refind Self: The Personality Test Game is a unique interactive science fiction in which the gameplay allows you to explore the depths of the user personality. In this 2D-visual short story, you fall in the place of the Android and find yourself on the grave of the doctor that created you. From this moment on, your journey unfolds as you are exploring different locations associated with the previous doctor, meeting along the way with various robots.

item.title: Rogue Labyrinth
item.description: Game Description Rogue Labyrinth throws you into a maze mosquito, the brainchild of a billionaire with a complex of God. But this is not Dedushkino’s journey through the dungeons. Of course, you will beat the monsters and dodge the chopper, but there is a performance element here. The numerous eyes of the maze are fixed on you, and they crave a show. The labyrinth itself is a changeable beast. Each entry promises a new turn, test - consider that this is a dungeon with adventures to choose from.

item.title: Schedule I
item.description: Game Description Schedule 1 puts a gamer in the place of a small drug dealer trying to build a criminal empire from scratch. The action takes place in the gloomy city of Highland Point, and users get the opportunity to expand the scale of their activities, controlling everyone - from production to sales. You will begin with an empty wallet and the necessary connections, gradually rising to control over the criminal world.

item.title: Shape of Dream
item.description: Game Description Shape of Dream A project whose essence is this: Imagine an action Rogue-Lite, seasoned with Moba elements, invented by Lizard Smoothie for PC roamers. Are you intrigued? Still. This world of dreams is your playground. You are sculpting the heroes from their memories, turning them into champions, like a sculptor from a cutter. Alone or with three friends in a cooperative, Adventure destroys the boundaries of the genre, offering something fresh.

item.title: Soul of the Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Soul of the Dungeon is an action with a view of the top, which makes the opponents resist the hordes in a hostile location. The gameplay is tied to survival in a series of attacks, collecting gold from defeated enemies and investing resources in pumping skills. Such progress is necessary, because each next wave is complicated, introducing more formidable rivals. The key task is built on constant adaptation and honing of combat techniques for the confrontation of the growing threat.

item.title: Soulfall
item.description: Game Description Soulfall is a gloomy fantasy adventure that immerses the hero in an ongoing battle for survival against the inconspicuous hordes of evil spirits. The space around the protagonist is constantly filled with demons, skeletons and other monsters, forcing him to constantly move and use the entire arsenal of abilities to reflect deadly waves. Each sortie into these damned lands becomes a unique test where the procedural generation of the world guarantees the absence of two identical passages.

item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate
item.description: Game Description Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate immerses players in a Roguelike adventure, in the center of which are your favorite ninja turtles. Here, gamers take on the roles of Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael, each of which is endowed with certain abilities. The narrative begins with the abduction of their mentor, Splinter, an evil Shredder. This laid the foundation for the study of various areas of New York, full of difficulties and enemies hiding behind each angle.

item.title: Terratech Worlds
item.description: Game Description In TerRatech Worlds, you will plunge with your head in a PVE survival with the open world on the mysterious planet of aliens. Put your way as a free prospector, exploring an extensive environment with an area of ​​300 km² with a variety of bioms, dynamic weather and a day/night cycle. To confront the hostile flora and fauna, rival fractions and insidious areas - and at the same time use the power of the planet in their interests.
